TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OpCodes extends System.Object

summary.span: 通过 类成员（例如 ）为发出提供 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令的字段表示形式。

span.span: Provides field representations of the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions for emission by the class members (such as ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成员操作码的详细说明，请参阅公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是"第三部分：CIL 指令集"和"分区 II:元数据定义和语义"。For a detailed description of the member opcodes, see the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set" and "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的示例演示动态方法使用的构造发出`OpCodes`到。The following example demonstrates the construction of a dynamic method using to emit `OpCodes` into a . [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.OpCodes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.OpCodes Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.OpCodes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.OpCodes Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.OpCodes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.OpCodes Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Add
Public Shared ReadOnly Add As OpCode

summary.span: 将两个值相加并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Adds two values and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5858|添加add|将两个数值相加，返回新的数字值。Adds two numeric values, returning a new numeric value.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈中弹出`value1`添加到`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is added to `value2`. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. 对于整数运算不检测溢出 (正确的溢出处理，请参阅)。Overflow is not detected for integer operations (for proper overflow handling, see ). 整数添加包装，而不是尽量充满。Integer addition wraps, rather than saturates. 例如，假定 8 位整数，其中`value1`都设置为 255 和`value2`设置为 1，已包装的结果是 0，而不是 256。For example, assuming 8-bit integers where `value1` is set to 255 and `value2` is set to 1, the wrapped result is 0 rather than 256. 返回浮点溢出`+inf`(`PositiveInfinity`) 或`-inf`(`NegativeInfinity`)。Floating-point overflow returns `+inf` (`PositiveInfinity`) or `-inf` (`NegativeInfinity`). 下表中列出的可接受的操作数类型和其相应的结果数据类型。The acceptable operand types and their corresponding result data type are listed in the table below. 如果没有任何条目进行特定类型的组合 (例如，`int32`和`float`;`int32`和`int64`)，它是无效的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 并生成错误。If there is no entry for a particular type combination (for example, `int32` and `float`; `int32` and `int64`), it is an invalid Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) and generates an error. |操作数operand|value1 类型value1 type|value2 类型value2 type|结果类型result type| |-------------|-----------------|-----------------|-----------------| |添加add|`int32`|`int32`|`int32`| |添加add|`int32`|`native int`|`native int`| |添加add|`int32`|`&`|`&`| |添加add|`int32`|`*`|`*`| |添加add|`int64`|`int64`|`int64`| |添加add|`native int`|`int32`|`native int`| |添加add|`native int`|`native int`|`native int`| |添加add|`native int`|`&`|`&`| |添加add|`native int`|`*`|`*`| |添加add|`F`|`F`|`F`| |添加add|`&`|`int32`|`&`| |添加add|`&`|`native int`|`&`| |添加add|`*`|`int32`|`*`| |添加add|`*`|`native int`|`*`| 以下方法重载可使用`add`操作码：The following method overload can use the `add` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将两个整数相加，执行溢出检查，并且将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Adds two integers, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D6D6|add.ovfadd.ovf|将添加两个有符号的整数值的溢出检查。Adds two signed integer values with an overflow check.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈中弹出`value1`添加到`value2`溢出检查。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is added to `value2` with a check for overflow. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. 如果结果中的结果类型不会显示将引发。 is thrown if the result is not represented in the result type. 您可以执行此操作对有符号整数。You can perform this operation on signed integers. 为浮点值，请使用。For floating-point values, use . 下表中列出的可接受的操作数类型和其相应的结果数据类型。The acceptable operand types and their corresponding result data type are listed in the table below. 如果没有任何条目进行特定类型的组合 (例如，`int32`和`float`;`int32`和`int64`)，它是一个无效的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令，将生成错误。If there is no entry for a particular type combination (for example, `int32` and `float`; `int32` and `int64`), it is an invalid Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instruction and generates an error. |操作数operand|value1 类型value1 type|value2 类型value2 type|结果类型result type| |-------------|-----------------|-----------------|-----------------| |添加add|`int32`|`int32`|`int32`| |添加add|`int32`|`native int`|`native int`| |添加add|`int32`|`&`|`&`| |添加add|`int32`|`*`|`*`| |添加add|`int64`|`int64`|`int64`| |添加add|`native int`|`int32`|`native int`| |添加add|`native int`|`native int`|`native int`| |添加add|`native int`|`&`|`&`| |添加add|`native int`|`*`|`*`| |添加add|`F`|`F`|`F`| |添加add|`&`|`int32`|`&`| |添加add|`&`|`native int`|`&`| |添加add|`*`|`int32`|`*`| |添加add|`*`|`native int`|`*`| 以下方法重载可使用`add.ovf`操作码：The following method overload can use the `add.ovf` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 将两个无符号整数值相加，执行溢出检查，并且将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Adds two unsigned integer values, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D7D7|add.ovf.unadd.ovf.un|将添加两个无符号的整数值的溢出检查。Adds two unsigned integer values with an overflow check.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈中弹出`value1`添加到`value2`溢出检查。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is added to `value2` with a check for overflow. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. 如果结果中的结果类型不会显示将引发。 is thrown if the result is not represented in the result type. 您可以执行此操作对有符号整数。You can perform this operation on signed integers. 为浮点值，请使用。For floating-point values, use . 下表中列出的可接受的操作数类型和其相应的结果数据类型。The acceptable operand types and their corresponding result data type are listed in the table below. 如果没有任何条目进行特定类型的组合 (例如，`int32`和`float`;`int32`和`int64`)，它是一个无效的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令，将生成错误。If there is no entry for a particular type combination (for example, `int32` and `float`; `int32` and `int64`), it is an invalid Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instruction and generates an error. |操作数operand|value1 类型value1 type|value2 类型value2 type|结果类型result type| |-------------|-----------------|-----------------|-----------------| |添加add|`int32`|`int32`|`int32`| |添加add|`int32`|`native int`|`native int`| |添加add|`int32`|`&`|`&`| |添加add|`int32`|`*`|`*`| |添加add|`int64`|`int64`|`int64`| |添加add|`native int`|`int32`|`native int`| |添加add|`native int`|`native int`|`native int`| |添加add|`native int`|`&`|`&`| |添加add|`native int`|`*`|`*`| |添加add|`F`|`F`|`F`| |添加add|`&`|`int32`|`&`| |添加add|`&`|`native int`|`&`| |添加add|`*`|`int32`|`*`| |添加add|`*`|`native int`|`*`| 以下方法重载可使用`add.ovf.un`操作码：The following method overload can use the `add.ovf.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode And
Public Shared ReadOnly And As OpCode

summary.span: 计算两个值的按位“与”并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Computes the bitwise AND of two values and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|指令Instruction|描述Description| |------------|-----------------|-----------------| |5F5F|和and|确定两个整数值的按位 AND。Determines the bitwise AND of two integer values.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value1` 和`value2`从堆栈中弹出计算两个值的按位 AND。`value1` and `value2` are popped from the stack; the bitwise AND of the two values is computed. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `and`指令计算堆栈上的前两个值的按位 AND，并将结果留在堆栈上。The `and` instruction computes the bitwise AND of the top two values on the stack and leaves the result on the stack. `And` 是特定于整数的操作。`And` is an integer-specific operation. 以下方法重载可使用`and`操作码：The following method overload can use the `and` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Arglist
Public Shared ReadOnly Arglist As OpCode

summary.span: 返回指向当前方法的参数列表的非托管指针。

span.span: Returns an unmanaged pointer to the argument list of the current method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 00FE 00|arglistarglist|返回当前方法的参数列表句柄。Returns an argument list handle for the current method.| 没有计算堆栈的行为被执行此操作。No evaluation stack behaviors are performed by this operation. `arglist`指令将返回一个不透明的句柄 (类型的非托管的指针`native int`)，表示当前方法的参数列表。The `arglist` instruction returns an opaque handle (an unmanaged pointer, of type `native int`) that represents the argument list of the current method. 此句柄仅在当前方法的生存期是有效。This handle is valid only during the lifetime of the current method. 但是，可以将该句柄传递给其他方法，前提是控件的线程上的当前方法。You can, however, pass the handle to other methods as long as the current method is on the thread of control. 您只能执行`arglist`采用数目可变的参数的方法中的指令。You can only execute the `arglist` instruction within a method that takes a variable number of arguments. 以下方法重载可使用`arglist`操作码：The following method overload can use the `arglist` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Beq
Public Shared ReadOnly Beq As OpCode

summary.span: 如果两个值相等，则将控制转移到目标指令。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction if two values are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |3B < `int32` >3B < `int32` >|beq `target`beq `target`|分支到目标指令处于偏移量`target`如果两个值是否相等。Branch to the target instruction at offset `target` if the two values are equal.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 并`value1`从堆栈弹出，则`value1`等同于`value2`，执行分支操作。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `beq`指令将控制转移到指定的目标指令如果`value1`等同于`value2`。The `beq` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is equal to `value2`. 效果等同于执行`ceq`指令后跟`brtrue`分支到特定目标指令。The effect is the same as performing a `ceq` instruction followed by a `brtrue` branch to the specific target instruction. 该目标指令被表示为 4 字节有符号偏移量从当前指令之后的指令的开头。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 下面概括了可接受的操作数类型：The acceptable operand types are encapsulated below: 如果该目标指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则仅将控制转移到第一个上述前缀之一。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制输入和输出传输`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`此指令不能执行块 (此类传输受到严格限制，必须使用指令相反)。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction (such transfers are severely restricted and must use the instruction instead). 以下方法重载可使用`beq`操作码：The following method overload can use the `beq` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，标签）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Beq_S
Public Shared ReadOnly Beq_S As OpCode

summary.span: 如果两个值相等，则将控制转移到目标指令（短格式）。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if two values are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |2E < `int8` >2E < `int8` >|beq.s `target`beq.s `target`|分支到目标指令处于偏移量`target`相等，如果短格式Branch to the target instruction at offset `target` if equal, short form| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 并`value1`从堆栈弹出，则`value1`等同于`value2`，执行分支操作。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `beq.s`指令将控制转移到指定的目标指令如果`value1`等同于`value2`。The `beq.s` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is equal to `value2`. 效果等同于执行`ceq`指令后跟`brtrue`分支到特定目标指令。The effect is the same as performing a `ceq` instruction followed by a `brtrue` branch to the specific target instruction. 目标指令被表示为 1 字节有符号偏移量从当前指令之后的指令的开头。The target instruction is represented as a 1-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 下面概括了可接受的操作数类型：The acceptable operand types are encapsulated below: 如果该目标指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则仅将控制转移到第一个上述前缀之一。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制输入和输出传输`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`此指令不能执行块 (此类传输受到严格限制，必须使用指令相反)。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction (such transfers are severely restricted and must use the instruction instead). 以下方法重载可使用`beq.s`操作码：The following method overload can use the `beq.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，标签）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

summary.span: 如果第一个值大于或等于第二个值，则将控制转移到目标指令。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |3C ``3C ``|bge `target`bge `target`|分支到目标指令的第一个值是否大于或等于第二个值指定的偏移量处。Branch to the target instruction at the specified offset if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 并`value1`从堆栈弹出，则`value1`大于或等于`value2`，执行分支操作。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is greater than or equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `bge`指令将控制转移到指定的目标指令如果`value1`大于或等于`value2`。The `bge` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is greater than or equal to `value2`. 效果等同于执行`clt.un`指令后跟`brfalse`分支到特定目标指令。The effect is identical to performing a `clt.un` instruction followed by a `brfalse` branch to the specific target instruction. 该目标指令被表示为 4 字节有符号偏移量从当前指令之后的指令的开头。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果该目标指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则仅将控制转移到第一个上述前缀之一。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制输入和输出传输`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`此指令不能执行块。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 以下方法重载可使用`bge`操作码：The following method overload can use the `bge` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，标签）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

summary.span: 如果第一个值大于或等于第二个值，则将控制转移到目标指令（短格式）。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |2F ``2F ``|bge.s `target`bge.s `target`|分支到目标指令的第一个值是否大于或等于第二个值，缩写形式指定的偏移量处。Branch to the target instruction at the specified offset if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value, short form.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 并`value1`从堆栈弹出，则`value1`大于或等于`value2`，执行分支操作。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is greater than or equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `bge.s`指令将控制转移到指定的目标指令如果`value1`大于或等于`value2`。The `bge.s` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is greater than or equal to `value2`. 效果等同于执行`clt.un`指令后跟`brfalse`分支到特定目标指令。The effect is identical to performing a `clt.un` instruction followed by a `brfalse` branch to the specific target instruction. 目标指令被表示为 1 字节有符号偏移量从当前指令之后的指令的开头。The target instruction is represented as a 1-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果该目标指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则仅将控制转移到第一个上述前缀之一。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制输入和输出传输`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`此指令不能执行块。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 以下方法重载可使用`bge.s`操作码：The following method overload can use the `bge.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，标签）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Bge_Un
Public Shared ReadOnly Bge_Un As OpCode

summary.span: 当比较无符号整数值或未经排序的浮点值时，如果第一个值大于第二个值，则将控制转移到目标指令。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is greater than the second value, when comparing unsigned integer values or unordered float values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |41 ``41 ``|进行 `target`bge.un `target`|分支到目标指令的第一个值是否大于或等于第二个值 （无符号值） 指定的偏移量处。Branch to the target instruction at the specified offset if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value (unsigned values).| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 并`value1`从堆栈弹出，则`value1`大于或等于`value2`，执行分支操作。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is greater than or equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `bge.un`指令将控制转移到指定的目标指令如果`value1`大于或等于`value2`，当使用无符号的整数或未经排序的浮点值进行比较。The `bge.un` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is greater than or equal to `value2`, when compared using unsigned integer or unordered float values. 效果等同于执行`clt`指令后跟`brfalse`分支到特定目标指令。The effect is identical to performing a `clt` instruction followed by a `brfalse` branch to the specific target instruction. 该目标指令被表示为 4 字节有符号偏移量从当前指令之后的指令的开头。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果该目标指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则仅将控制转移到第一个上述前缀之一。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制输入和输出传输`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`此指令不能执行块。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 以下方法重载可使用`bge.un`操作码：The following method overload can use the `bge.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，标签）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |31 ``31 ``|ble.s `target`ble.s `target`|分支到目标指令，如果第一个值小于或等于第二个值，缩写形式的指定偏移量。Branch to the target instruction at the specified offset if the first value is less than or equal to the second value, short form.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 并`value1`从堆栈弹出，则`value1`小于或等于`value2`，执行分支操作。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is less than or equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `ble.s`指令将控制转移到指定的目标指令如果`value1`小于或等于`value2`。The `ble.s` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is less than or equal to `value2`. 效果等同于执行`cgt`指令 (`cgt.un`为浮点数) 指令后跟`brfalse`分支到特定目标指令。The effect is identical to performing a `cgt` instruction (`cgt.un` for floats) instruction followed by a`brfalse` branch to the specific target instruction. 目标指令被表示为 1 字节有符号偏移量从当前指令之后的指令的开头。The target instruction is represented as a 1-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果该目标指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则仅将控制转移到第一个上述前缀之一。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制输入和输出传输`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`此指令不能执行块。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 以下方法重载可使用`ble.s`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ble.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，标签）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ble_Un
Public Shared ReadOnly Ble_Un As OpCode

summary.span: 当比较无符号整数值或未经排序的浮点值时，如果第一个值小于或等于第二个值，则将控制转移到目标指令。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is less than or equal to the second value, when comparing unsigned integer values or unordered float values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |43 ``43 ``|时 `target`ble.un `target`|分支到目标指令，如果第一个值小于或等于第二个值 （无符号值），则指定的偏移量。Branch to the target instruction at the specified offset if the first value is less than or equal to the second value (unsigned values).| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 并`value1`从堆栈弹出，则`value1`小于或等于`value2`，执行分支操作。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is less than or equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `ble.un`指令将控制转移到指定的目标指令如果`value1`小于或等于`value2`，当使用无符号的整数或未经排序的浮点值进行比较。The `ble.un` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is less than or equal to `value2`, when compared using unsigned integer or unordered float values. 效果等同于执行`cgt.un`指令 (`cgt`对于浮点型值) 后跟`brfalse`分支到特定目标指令。The effect is identical to performing a `cgt.un` instruction (`cgt` for floats) followed by a `brfalse` branch to the specific target instruction. 该目标指令被表示为 4 字节有符号偏移量从当前指令之后的指令的开头。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果该目标指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则仅将控制转移到第一个上述前缀之一。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制输入和输出传输`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`此指令不能执行块。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 以下方法重载可使用`ble.un`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ble.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，标签）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

summary.span: 当两个无符号整数值或未经排序的浮点值不相等时，将控制转移到目标指令（短格式）。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) when two unsigned integer values or unordered float values are not equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |33 < `int8` >33 < `int8` >|bne.un.s `target`bne.un.s `target`|分支到目标指令，如果两个无符号整数值指定的偏移量是不等于 （无符号的值）、 缩写形式。Branch to the target instruction at the specified offset if two unsigned integer values are not equal (unsigned values), short form.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 并`value1`从堆栈弹出，则`value1`不等于`value2`，执行分支操作。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is not equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `bne.un`指令将控制转移到指定的目标指令如果`value1`不等于`value2`，当使用无符号的整数或未经排序的浮点值进行比较。The `bne.un` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is not equal to `value2`, when compared using unsigned integer or unordered float values. 效果等同于执行`ceq`指令后跟`brfalse`分支到特定目标指令。The effect is identical to performing a `ceq` instruction followed by a `brfalse` branch to the specific target instruction. 该目标指令被表示为 4 字节有符号偏移量从当前指令之后的指令的开头。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果该目标指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则仅将控制转移到第一个上述前缀之一。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制输入和输出传输`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`此指令不能执行块。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 以下方法重载可使用`bne.un.s`操作码：The following method overload can use the `bne.un.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，标签）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Box
Public Shared ReadOnly Box As OpCode

summary.span: 将值类转换为对象引用（ 类型）。

span.span: Converts a value type to an object reference (type ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |8C < `T` >8C < `T` >|框 `valTypeToken`box `valTypeToken`|将值类型转换 (在指定的类型的`valTypeToken`) 为真正的对象引用。Convert a value type (of the type specified in `valTypeToken`) to a true object reference.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 值类型推送到堆栈上。A value type is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出值类型`box`执行操作。The value type is popped from the stack; the `box` operation is performed. 3. 对生成的"装箱"的值类型的对象引用推送到堆栈上。An object reference to the resulting "boxed" value type is pushed onto the stack. 值类型具有两个单独的表示形式中公共语言基础结构 (CLI):A value type has two separate representations within the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI): - 使用值类型嵌入在另一个对象中或在堆栈上时的原始格式。A 'raw' form used when a value type is embedded within another object or on the stack. - 装箱形式，其中的值类型中的数据被包装 （装箱） 到一个对象以便它可以作为一个独立的实体存在。A 'boxed' form, where the data in the value type is wrapped (boxed) into an object so it can exist as an independent entity. `box`指令将转换的对象引用为原始 （未装箱） 的值类型 (类型`O`)。The `box` instruction converts the 'raw' (unboxed) value type into an object reference (type `O`). 这是通过创建一个新的对象并将数据复制到新分配的对象的值类型实现的。This is accomplished by creating a new object and copying the data from the value type into the newly allocated object. `valTypeToken` 元数据标记指示在堆栈上的值类型的类型。`valTypeToken` is a metadata token indicating the type of the value type on the stack. 如果没有足够的内存来满足该请求将引发。 is thrown if there is insufficient memory to satisfy the request. 如果找不到类将引发。 is thrown if the class cannot be found. 在 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 转换为本机代码，而不是在运行时，通常是检测到此问题。This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) is converted to native code, rather than at runtime. 以下方法重载可使用`box`操作码：The following method overload can use the `box` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，Type）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

Public Shared ReadOnly Br As OpCode

summary.span: 无条件地将控制转移到目标指令。

span.span: Unconditionally transfers control to a target instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |38 < `int32` >38 < `int32` >|br `target`br `target`|到目标指令指定的偏移量处的分支。Branches to a target instruction at the specified offset.| 没有计算堆栈的行为被执行此操作。No evaluation stack behaviors are performed by this operation. `br`指令无条件将控制转移到目标指令。The `br` instruction unconditionally transfers control to a target instruction. 该目标指令被表示为 4 字节有符号偏移量从当前指令之后的指令的开头。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果该目标指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则仅将控制转移到第一个上述前缀之一。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制输入和输出传输`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`此指令不能执行块。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 以下方法重载可使用`br`操作码：The following method overload can use the `br` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，标签）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

Public Shared ReadOnly Break As OpCode

summary.span: 向公共语言结构 (CLI) 发出信号以通知调试器已撞上了一个断点。

span.span: Signals the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) to inform the debugger that a break point has been tripped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0101|breakbreak|通知调试器已达到断点。inform a debugger that a breakpoint has been reached.| 没有计算堆栈的行为被执行此操作。No evaluation stack behaviors are performed by this operation. `break`指令是用于支持调试。The `break` instruction is for debugging support. 它发出信号以通知调试器已撞上了一个中断 CLI。It signals the CLI to inform the debugger that a break point has been tripped. 它不起其他解释器状态。It has no other effect on the interpreter state. `break`条指令的最小可能使代码指令大小与中断点修补和生成到周围的代码影响最小。The `break` instruction has the smallest possible instruction size enabling code patching with a break point and generating minimal disturbance to the surrounding code. `break`指令可以捕获调试器、 不执行任何操作，或引发安全异常。The `break` instruction can trap to a debugger, do nothing, or raise a security exception. 确切的行为是实现定义的。The exact behavior is implementation-defined. 以下方法重载可使用`break`操作码：The following method overload can use the `break` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 如果 为 、空引用（Visual Basic 中的 ）或零，则将控制转移到目标指令。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction if is , a null reference ( in Visual Basic), or zero.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |39 < `int32` >39 < `int32` >|brfalse `target`brfalse `target`

brnull `target`brnull `target`

brzero `target`brzero `target`|分支到目标指令在指定的偏移量 if `false`。Branches to a target instruction at the specified offset if `false`.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上一操作。`value` is pushed onto the stack by a previous operation. 2. `value` 从堆栈中弹出如果`value`是`false`，分支到`target`。`value` is popped from the stack; if `value` is `false`, branch to `target`. `brfalse`指令 (和其别名`brnull`并`brzero`) 将控制转移到指定的目标指令，如果`value`(类型的`int32`， `int64`，对象引用`O`、 托管指针`&`，瞬态指针`*`， `native int`) 为零 (`false`)。The `brfalse` instruction (and its aliases `brnull` and `brzero`) transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value` (of type `int32`, `int64`, object reference `O`, managed pointer `&`, transient pointer `*`, `native int`) is zero (`false`). 如果`value`不为零 (`true`) 在下一条指令处继续执行。If `value` is non-zero (`true`) execution continues at the next instruction. 该目标指令被表示为 4 字节有符号偏移量从当前指令之后的指令的开头。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果该目标指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则仅将控制转移到第一个上述前缀之一。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制输入和输出传输`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`此指令不能执行块。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 以下方法重载可使用`brfalse`操作码：The following method overload can use the `brfalse` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，标签）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |3A < `int32` >3A < `int32` >|brtrue `target`brtrue `target`

brinst `target`brinst `target`|如果非零值到目标指令指定的偏移量处分支 (`true`)。Branch to a target instruction at the specified offset if non-zero (`true`).| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上一操作。`value` is pushed onto the stack by a previous operation. 2. `value` 从堆栈中弹出如果`value`是`true`，分支到`target`。`value` is popped from the stack; if `value` is `true`, branch to `target`. `brtrue`指令将控制转移到指定的目标指令如果`value`(类型`native int`) 为非零值 (`true`)。The `brtrue` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value` (type `native int`) is nonzero (`true`). 如果`value`为零 (`false`) 在下一条指令处继续执行。If `value` is zero (`false`) execution continues at the next instruction. 如果`value`是一个对象引用 (类型`O`) 然后`brinst`(别名`brtrue`) 将控制转移如果它表示对象的实例 (例如，如果它不是空对象引用中; 请参阅)。If `value` is an object reference (type `O`) then `brinst` (an alias for `brtrue`) transfers control if it represents an instance of an object (for example, if it is not the null object reference; see ). 该目标指令被表示为 4 字节有符号偏移量从当前指令之后的指令的开头。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果该目标指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则仅将控制转移到第一个上述前缀之一。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制输入和输出传输`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`此指令不能执行块。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 以下方法重载可使用`brtrue`操作码：The following method overload can use the `brtrue` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，标签）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Call
Public Shared ReadOnly Call As OpCode

summary.span: 调用由传递的方法说明符指示的方法。

span.span: Calls the method indicated by the passed method descriptor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |28 < `T` >28 < `T` >|调用 `methodDesc`call `methodDesc`|调用方法所描述`methodDesc`。Call the method described by `methodDesc`.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 方法参数`arg1`通过`argN`推送到堆栈上。Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` are pushed onto the stack. 2. 方法参数`arg1`通过`argN`弹出，从堆栈; 方法调用执行用这些自变量和控制传输到引用的方法描述符的方法。Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` are popped from the stack; the method call is performed with these arguments and control is transferred to the method referred to by the method descriptor. 完成后，返回值是由被调用方方法生成并发送给调用方。When complete, a return value is generated by the callee method and sent to the caller. 3. 返回值推送到堆栈上。The return value is pushed onto the stack. `call`指令调用由随指令一起传递的方法说明符指示的方法。The `call` instruction calls the method indicated by the method descriptor passed with the instruction. 方法描述符是一个元数据标记，指示方法调用和数量、 类型和已放置在要传递给该方法，以及要使用的调用约定的堆栈的参数的顺序。The method descriptor is a metadata token that indicates the method to call and the number, type, and order of the arguments that have been placed on the stack to be passed to that method as well as the calling convention to be used. `call`指令可以立即前面`tail`() 前缀指令，以指定应将控制转移之前释放当前的方法状态。The `call` instruction can be immediately preceded by a `tail` () prefix instruction to specify that the current method state should be released before transferring control. 如果在调用将控制转移到更高的信任比原始方法的方法，将不会释放堆栈帧。If the call transfers control to a method of higher trust than the origin method, the stack frame is not released. 相反，在执行无提示方式继续像`tail`尚未提供。Instead, the execution continues silently as if the `tail` had not been supplied. 元数据令牌携带足够的信息来确定是否该调用是对静态方法、 实例方法，一个虚拟方法或全局函数。The metadata token carries sufficient information to determine whether the call is to a static method, an instance method, a virtual method, or a global function. 在所有这些情况下完全从方法描述符确定目标地址 (与此对比指令用于调用虚方法，其中的目标地址还取决于该实例的运行时类型引用推送之前)。In all of these cases the destination address is determined entirely from the method descriptor (contrast this with the instruction for calling virtual methods, where the destination address also depends upon the runtime type of the instance reference pushed before the ). 参数中从左到右的顺序放置在堆栈上。The arguments are placed on the stack in left-to-right order. 也就是说，第一个参数是计算，并放置在堆栈中，则第二个参数，则第三，直到所有必需的自变量都位于降序排序堆栈上。That is, the first argument is computed and placed on the stack, then the second argument, then the third, until all necessary arguments are atop the stack in descending order. 有三种重要特殊情况：There are three important special cases: 1. 调用方法实例 （或虚拟） 必须推送之前的所有用户可见的参数的该实例引用。Calls to an instance (or virtual) method must push that instance reference before any of the user-visible arguments. 实例引用不能为 null 引用。The instance reference must not be a null reference. 元数据中的签名不包含的参数列表中的条目`this`指针; 相反，它使用位指示方法是否需要传递`this`指针。The signature carried in the metadata does not contain an entry in the parameter list for the `this` pointer; instead, it uses a bit to indicate whether the method requires passing the `this` pointer. 2. 它是可以调用虚方法使用`call`(而非`callvirt`); 这指示该方法是使用指定的方法，而不是所调用的对象从动态指定的类会得到解决。It is valid to call a virtual method using `call` (rather than `callvirt`); this indicates that the method is to be resolved using the class specified by method rather than as specified dynamically from the object being invoked. 3. 请注意，一个委托`Invoke`可以通过调用方法`call`或`callvirt`指令。Note that a delegate's `Invoke` method can be called with either the `call` or `callvirt` instruction. 如果系统安全性不会授予对所调用的方法的调用方访问，可能会引发。 may be thrown if system security does not grant the caller access to the called method. 在 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令转换为本机代码，而不是在运行时，可能会进行安全检查。The security check may occur when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code rather than at run time. > [!NOTE] > 如果在值类型上调用的 System.Object 方法，请考虑使用`constrained`带有前缀`callvirt`指令而不是发出`call`指令。When calling methods of System.Object on value types, consider using the `constrained` prefix with the `callvirt` instruction instead of emitting a `call` instruction. 这无需发出不同 IL 具体取决于值类型重写方法，从而避免潜在的版本控制问题。This removes the need to emit different IL depending on whether or not the value type overrides the method, avoiding a potential versioning problem. 请考虑使用`constrained`可以使用更改时对调用接口方法的值类型，因为实现的接口方法的值类型方法的前缀`MethodImpl`。Consider using the `constrained` prefix when invoking interface methods on value types, since the value type method implementing the interface method can be changed using a `MethodImpl`. 中更详细地描述了这些问题操作码。These issues are described in more detail in the opcode. 以下方法重载可使用`call`操作码：The following method overloads can use the `call` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，MethodInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo) - ILGenerator.EmitCall (操作码，MethodInfo Type[])ILGenerator.EmitCall(OpCode, MethodInfo, Type[]) > [!NOTE] > 方法为提供`varargs`调用。The method is provided for `varargs` calls. 使用方法进行正常调用。Use the method for normal calls.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Calli
Public Shared ReadOnly Calli As OpCode

summary.span: 通过调用约定描述的参数调用在计算堆栈上指示的方法（作为指向入口点的指针）。

span.span: Calls the method indicated on the evaluation stack (as a pointer to an entry point) with arguments described by a calling convention.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |29 < `T` >29 < `T` >|calli `callSiteDescr`calli `callSiteDescr`|调用的调用约定描述的参数指向的方法。Calls the method pointed to with arguments described by the calling convention.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 方法参数`arg1`通过`argN`推送到堆栈上。Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` are pushed onto the stack. 2. 方法入口指针推送到堆栈上。The method entry pointer is pushed onto the stack. 3. 方法参数`arg1`通过`argN`和从堆栈中弹出方法入口指针; 执行调用的方法。Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` and the method entry pointer are popped from the stack; the call to the method is performed. 完成后，返回值是由被调用方方法生成并发送给调用方。When complete, a return value is generated by the callee method and sent to the caller. 4. 返回值推送到堆栈上。The return value is pushed onto the stack. `calli`指令调用带有参数的方法入口指针`arg1`通过`argN`。The `calli` instruction calls the method entry pointer with the arguments `arg1` through `argN`. 由特定的调用约定描述这些参数的类型 (`callSiteDesc`)。The types of these arguments are described by the specific calling convention (`callSiteDesc`). `calli`指令可能会立即前面`tail`前缀 ()，以指定应将控制转移之前释放当前的方法状态。The `calli` instruction may be immediately preceded by a `tail` prefix () to specify that the current method state should be released before transferring control. 如果在调用时将传输到更高的信任度比原始方法的堆栈帧的方法控制将不释放;相反，会以无提示方式继续执行像`tail`尚未提供。If the call would transfer control to a method of higher trust than the origin method the stack frame will not be released; instead, the execution will continue silently as if the `tail` had not been supplied. 方法入口指针被假定为指向 （的目标计算机） 可以使用参数所描述的调用约定 （独立签名的元数据标记） 以合法方式调用的本机代码的特定指针。The method entry pointer is assumed to be a specific pointer to native code (of the target machine) that can be legitimately called with the arguments described by the calling convention (a metadata token for a stand-alone signature). 可以使用创建此类指针或的说明，或从本机代码中传递。Such a pointer can be created using the or instructions, or passed in from native code. 调用约定不会动态检查，因此代码，则使用`calli`如果目标实际上没有使用指定的调用约定，说明无法正常工作。The calling convention is not checked dynamically, so code that uses a `calli` instruction does not work correctly if the destination does not actually use the specified calling convention. 参数中从左到右的顺序放置在堆栈上。The arguments are placed on the stack in left-to-right order. 也就是说，第一个参数是计算，并放置在堆栈中，则第二个参数，则第三，直到所有必需的自变量都位于降序排序堆栈上。That is, the first argument is computed and placed on the stack, then the second argument, then the third, until all necessary arguments are atop the stack in descending order. 实例或虚方法的参数生成代码序列必须将该实例引用 （即不能为空引用） 推送之前的所有用户可见的参数。The argument-building code sequence for an instance or virtual method must push that instance reference (which must not be a null reference) before any of the user-visible arguments. 如果系统安全性不会授予对所调用的方法的调用方访问，可能会引发。 may be thrown if the system security does not grant the caller access to the called method. 在 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令转换为本机代码，而不是在运行时，可以进行安全检查。The security check can occur when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code rather than at runtime. 以下方法可用于执行`calli`在堆栈上的指令。The following methods can be used to perform a `calli` instruction on the stack. 请注意，`calli`应通过调用以下方法，而不是使用类直接在堆栈上放置该指令。Note that `calli` should be called through the below methods rather than using the class to place the instruction directly on the stack. - ILGenerator.EmitCalli (操作码、 CallingConventions、 类型、 Type []，Type[]) 使用托管调用约定的调用。ILGenerator.EmitCalli(Opcode, CallingConventions, Type, Type[], Type[]) for calls using a managed calling convention. - ILGenerator.EmitCalli （操作码，CallingConvention，类型，Type[]) 使用非托管调用约定的调用。ILGenerator.EmitCalli(Opcode, CallingConvention, Type, Type[]) for calls using an unmanaged calling convention.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Callvirt
Public Shared ReadOnly Callvirt As OpCode

summary.span: 对对象调用后期绑定方法，并且将返回值推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Calls a late-bound method on an object, pushing the return value onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6F < `T` >6F < `T` >|callvirt `method`callvirt `method`|调用与相关联的特定方法`obj`。Calls a specific method associated with `obj`.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个对象引用`obj`推送到堆栈上。An object reference `obj` is pushed onto the stack. 2. 方法参数`arg1`通过`argN`推送到堆栈上。Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` are pushed onto the stack. 3. 方法参数`arg1`通过`argN`和对象引用`obj`从堆栈中弹出用这些自变量执行方法调用和控制转移到其中的方法中`obj`方法引用元数据标记。Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` and the object reference `obj` are popped from the stack; the method call is performed with these arguments and control is transferred to the method in `obj` referred to by the method metadata token. 完成后，返回值是由被调用方方法生成并发送给调用方。When complete, a return value is generated by the callee method and sent to the caller. 4. 返回值推送到堆栈上。The return value is pushed onto the stack. `callvirt`指令对对象调用后期绑定方法。The `callvirt` instruction calls a late-bound method on an object. 也就是说，该方法根据选择的运行时类型`obj`而不是在方法指针中可见的编译时类。That is, the method is chosen based on the runtime type of `obj` rather than the compile-time class visible in the method pointer. `Callvirt` 可用来调用虚拟和实例方法。`Callvirt` can be used to call both virtual and instance methods. `callvirt`指令可能会立即前面`tail`() 前缀，以指定应将控制转移之前释放当前堆栈帧。The `callvirt` instruction may be immediately preceded by a `tail` () prefix to specify that the current stack frame should be released before transferring control. 如果在调用时将传输将不发布到比原始方法的堆栈帧的信任级别更高的方法的控件。If the call would transfer control to a method of higher trust than the original method the stack frame will not be released. 方法的元数据令牌提供的名称、 类和要调用的方法的签名。The method metadata token provides the name, class and signature of the method to call. 与关联的类`obj`是它的实例的类。The class associated with `obj` is the class of which it is an instance. 如果类定义相匹配的指示的方法名称和签名的非静态方法，调用此方法。If the class defines a non-static method that matches the indicated method name and signature, this method is called. 否则按顺序检查此类的基类链中的所有类。Otherwise all classes in the base class chain of this class are checked in order. 如果未不找到任何方法，它是错误。It is an error if no method is found. `Callvirt` 调用方法之前弹出对象以及从计算堆栈的关联的参数。`Callvirt` pops the object and the associated arguments off the evaluation stack before calling the method. 如果该方法具有返回值，它会在方法完成后在堆栈上推送。If the method has a return value, it is pushed on the stack upon method completion. 被调用方侧`obj`参数将作为参数 0，访问`arg1`作为自变量 1，依此类推。On the callee side, the `obj` parameter is accessed as argument 0, `arg1` as argument 1, and so on. 参数中从左到右的顺序放置在堆栈上。The arguments are placed on the stack in left-to-right order. 也就是说，第一个参数是计算，并放置在堆栈中，则第二个参数，则第三，直到所有必需的自变量都位于降序排序堆栈上。That is, the first argument is computed and placed on the stack, then the second argument, then the third, until all necessary arguments are atop the stack in descending order. 实例引用`obj`(始终需要的`callvirt`) 必须推送之前的所有用户可见的参数。The instance reference `obj` (always required for `callvirt`) must be pushed before any of the user-visible arguments. （带有元数据令牌中） 的签名不需要此包含参数列表中的条目指针。The signature (carried in the metadata token) need not contain an entry in the parameter list for the this pointer. 请注意，还可以使用调用虚拟方法指令。Note that a virtual method can also be called using the instruction. 如果与关联的类中找不到具有指定的名称和签名的非静态方法，将引发`obj`或任何其基类。 is thrown if a non-static method with the indicated name and signature could not be found in the class associated with `obj` or any of its base classes. 在 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令转换为本机代码，而不是在运行时，通常是检测到此问题。This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, rather than at runtime. obj 为 null 时引发。 is thrown if obj is null. 如果系统安全性不会授予对所调用的方法的调用方访问权限会引发。 is thrown if system security does not grant the caller access to the called method. 在 CIL 被转换为本机代码，而不是在运行时，可能会进行安全检查。The security check may occur when the CIL is converted to native code rather than at run time. > [!NOTE] > 如果在值类型上调用的 System.Object 方法，请考虑使用`constrained`带有前缀`callvirt`指令。When calling methods of System.Object on value types, consider using the `constrained` prefix with the `callvirt` instruction. 这无需发出不同 IL 具体取决于值类型重写方法，从而避免潜在的版本控制问题。This removes the need to emit different IL depending on whether or not the value type overrides the method, avoiding a potential versioning problem. 请考虑使用`constrained`可以使用更改时对调用接口方法的值类型，因为实现的接口方法的值类型方法的前缀`MethodImpl`。Consider using the `constrained` prefix when invoking interface methods on value types, since the value type method implementing the interface method can be changed using a `MethodImpl`. 中更详细地描述了这些问题操作码。These issues are described in more detail in the opcode. 以下方法重载可使用`callvirt`操作码：The following method overload can use the `callvirt` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，MethodInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo) - ILGenerator.EmitCall (操作码，MethodInfo Type[])ILGenerator.EmitCall(OpCode, MethodInfo, Type[])

Public Shared ReadOnly Castclass As OpCode

summary.span: 尝试将引用传递的对象转换为指定的类。

span.span: Attempts to cast an object passed by reference to the specified class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |74 < `T` >74 < `T` >|castclass `class`castclass `class`|将对象转换为类型的新对象`class`。Casts an object to a new object of type `class`.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个对象引用推送到堆栈上。An object reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出对象引用被引用的对象被强制转换为指定`class`。The object reference is popped from the stack; the referenced object is cast as the specified `class`. 3. 如果成功，新的对象引用推送到堆栈上。If successful, a new object reference is pushed onto the stack. `castclass`指令会尝试将对象引用强制转换 (类型`O`) 位于指定类到堆栈上。The `castclass` instruction attempts to cast the object reference (type `O`) atop the stack to a specified class. 由元数据标记，该值指示所需的类指定新类。The new class is specified by a metadata token indicating the desired class. 如果位于堆栈顶部的对象的类未实现 （假定新类一个接口） 的新类并不是派生的类的新类则引发。If the class of the object on the top of the stack does not implement the new class (assuming the new class is an interface) and is not a derived class of the new class then an is thrown. 如果对象引用为空引用，则`castclass`成功并返回新的对象为 null 引用。If the object reference is a null reference, `castclass` succeeds and returns the new object as a null reference. 如果 obj 不能强制转换为类将引发。 is thrown if obj cannot be cast to class. 如果找不到类将引发。 is thrown if class cannot be found. 在 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令将转换为本机代码，而不是在运行时，通常是检测到此问题。This is typically detected when a Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instruction is converted to native code rather than at runtime. 以下方法重载可使用`castclass`操作码：The following method overload can use the `castclass` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，Type）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ceq
Public Shared ReadOnly Ceq As OpCode

summary.span: 比较两个值。

span.span: Compares two values.

summary.span: 如果这两个值相等，则将整数值 1 ) 推送到计算堆栈上；否则，将 0 () 推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: If they are equal, the integer value 1 ) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 () is pushed onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 01FE 01|ceqceq|如果推送 1`value1`等于`value2`; 否则将推送 0。Pushes 1 if `value1` equals `value2`; else pushes 0.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈中弹出`value1`进行比较的`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is compared to `value2`. 4. 如果`value1`等同于`value2`，1 推送到堆栈上; 否则为 0 推入堆栈。If `value1` is equal to `value2`, 1 is pushed onto the stack; otherwise 0 is pushed onto the stack. `ceq`指令进行比较`value1`和`value2`。The `ceq` instruction compares `value1` and `value2`. 如果`value1`等同于`value2`，然后 1 (类型的`int32`) 推送到堆栈上。If `value1` is equal to `value2`, then 1 (of type `int32`) is pushed on the stack. 否则为 0 (类型的`int32`) 推送到堆栈上。Otherwise 0 (of type `int32`) is pushed on the stack. 为浮点数，`ceq`将返回 0，如果数字是无序 （或者两种方法是 NaN）。For floating-point number, `ceq` will return 0 if the numbers are unordered (either or both are NaN). 无限期的值相等其自身。The infinite values are equal to themselves. 以下方法重载可使用`ceq`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ceq` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Cgt
Public Shared ReadOnly Cgt As OpCode

summary.span: 比较两个值。

span.span: Compares two values.

summary.span: 如果第一个值大于第二个值，则将整数值 1 ) 推送到计算堆栈上；反之，将 0 () 推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: If the first value is greater than the second, the integer value 1 ) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 () is pushed onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 02FE 02|则 cgtcgt|如果推送 1`value1`大于`value2`; 否则将推送 0。Pushes 1 if `value1` is greater than `value2`; else pushes 0.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈中弹出`cgt`测试`value1`大于`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `cgt` tests if `value1` is greater than `value2`. 4. 如果`value1`大于`value2`，1 推送到堆栈上; 否则为 0 推入堆栈。If `value1` is greater than `value2`, 1 is pushed onto the stack; otherwise 0 is pushed onto the stack. `cgt`指令进行比较`value1`和`value2`。The `cgt` instruction compares `value1` and `value2`. 如果`value1`完全大于`value2`，则`int32`值为 1 推送到堆栈上。If `value1` is strictly greater than `value2`, then an `int32` value of 1 is pushed on the stack. 否则为`int32`0 的值推送到堆栈上。Otherwise, an `int32` value of 0 is pushed on the stack. - 对于浮点数，`cgt`如果数字是无序 （即，如果一个或两个参数为 NaN），则返回 0。For floating-point numbers, `cgt` returns 0 if the numbers are unordered (that is, if one or both of the arguments are NaN). 以下方法重载可使用`cgt`操作码：The following method overload can use the `cgt` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |C3C3|ckfiniteckfinite|引发如果值不是有限的。throw if value is not a finite number.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 从堆栈中弹出和`ckfinite`对其执行指令。`value` is popped from the stack and the `ckfinite` instruction is performed on it. 3. `value` 是如果推送回到堆栈上不会引发异常。`value` is pushed back onto the stack if no exception is thrown. `ckfinite instruction`将引发如果`value`（浮点数） 是"不是数字"值 (NaN) 或`+-`无穷大值。The `ckfinite instruction` throws if `value` (a floating-point number) is either a "not a number" value (NaN) or a `+-` infinity value. `Ckfinite` 如果不引发任何异常在堆栈上留出的值。`Ckfinite` leaves the value on the stack if no exception is thrown. 如果执行是未指定`value`不是浮点数。Execution is unspecified if `value` is not a floating-point number. 如果引发`value`不是正常数。 is thrown if `value` is not a 'normal' number. 请注意，一个特殊的异常或派生的类的可能更为合适，将不正确的值传递到异常处理程序。Note that a special exception or a derived class of may be more appropriate, passing the incorrect value to the exception handler. 以下方法重载可使用`ckfinite`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ckfinite` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

span.span: If the first value is less than the second, the integer value 1 ) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 () is pushed onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 04FE 04|cltclt|如果推送 1`value1`是小于`value2`; 否则将推送 0。Pushes 1 if `value1` is less than `value2`; else pushes 0.| 按先后顺序是堆栈的转换行为：`value1`推送到堆栈上。The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: `value1` is pushed onto the stack. 1. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈中弹出`clt`测试`value1`是小于`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `clt` tests if `value1` is less than `value2`. 3. 如果`value1`是小于`value2`，1 推送到堆栈上; 否则为 0 推入堆栈。If `value1` is less than `value2`, 1 is pushed onto the stack; otherwise 0 is pushed onto the stack. `clt`指令进行比较`value1`和`value2`。The `clt` instruction compares `value1` and `value2`. 如果`value1`是严格小于`value2`，则`int32`值为 1 推送到堆栈上。If `value1` is strictly less than `value2`, then an `int32` value of 1 is pushed on the stack. 否则为`int32`0 的值推送到堆栈上。Otherwise, an `int32` value of 0 is pushed on the stack. - 对于浮点数，`clt`如果数字是无序 （即，如果一个或两个参数为 NaN），则返回 0。For floating-point numbers, `clt` returns 0 if the numbers are unordered (that is, if one or both of the arguments are NaN). 以下方法重载可使用`clt`操作码：The following method overload can use the `clt` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 05FE 05|条clt.un|如果推送 1`value1`是小于`value2`; 否则将推送 0 （无符号值）。Pushes 1 if `value1` is less than `value2`; else pushes 0 (unsigned values).| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈中弹出`clt.un`测试`value1`是小于`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `clt.un` tests if `value1` is less than `value2`. 4. 如果`value1`是小于`value2`，1 推送到堆栈上; 否则为 0 推入堆栈。If `value1` is less than `value2`, 1 is pushed onto the stack; otherwise 0 is pushed onto the stack. `clt.un`指令进行比较`value1`和`value2`。The `clt.un` instruction compares `value1` and `value2`. `int32`值为 1 推送到堆栈上，如果任意下列条件成立：An `int32` value of 1 is pushed on the stack if any of the following is true: - `value1` 是严格小于`value2`(对于`clt`)。`value1` is strictly less than `value2` (as for `clt`). - 对于浮点数`value1`未排序与`value2`。For floating-point numbers, `value1` is not ordered with respect to `value2`. - 对于整数值，`value1`是严格小于`value2`时视为无符号数字。For integer values, `value1` is strictly less than `value2` when considered as unsigned numbers. 否则为`int32`0 的值推送到堆栈上。Otherwise, an `int32` value of 0 is pushed on the stack. 以下方法重载可使用`clt.un`操作码：The following method overload can use the `clt.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Constrained
Public Shared ReadOnly Constrained As OpCode

summary.span: 约束要对其进行虚方法调用的类型。

span.span: Constrains the type on which a virtual method call is made.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 16 < `T` >FE 16 < `T` >|受限制。constrained. `thisType`|调用类型上的虚拟方法约束类型`T`。Call a virtual method on a type constrained to be type `T`.| `constrained`上只允许前缀`callvirt`指令。The `constrained` prefix is permitted only on a `callvirt` instruction. 此时 MSIL 堆栈的状态必须按如下所示：The state of the MSIL stack at this point must be as follows: 1. 托管的指针， `ptr`，推送到堆栈上。A managed pointer, `ptr`, is pushed onto the stack. 类型`ptr`必须是托管的指针 (`&`) 到`thisType`。The type of `ptr` must be a managed pointer (`&`) to `thisType`. 请注意，这不同于与无前缀的用例`callvirt`指令，需要引用的`thisType`。Note that this is different from the case of an unprefixed `callvirt` instruction, which expects a reference of `thisType`. 2. 方法参数`arg1`通过`argN`推送到堆栈，就像使用没有前缀`callvirt`指令。Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` are pushed onto the stack, just as with an unprefixed `callvirt` instruction. `constrained`前缀被设计为允许`callvirt`说明进行操作，使其以统一方式独立于是否`thisType`是值类型还是引用类型。The `constrained` prefix is designed to allow `callvirt` instructions to be made in a uniform way independent of whether `thisType` is a value type or a reference type. 当`callvirt``method`指令加`constrained` `thisType`，执行的指令，如下所示：When a `callvirt` `method` instruction has been prefixed by `constrained` `thisType`, the instruction is executed as follows: - 如果`thisType`是引用类型 （而不是值类型），然后`ptr`是取消引用，并指向 this 指针作为传递`callvirt`的`method`。If `thisType` is a reference type (as opposed to a value type) then `ptr` is dereferenced and passed as the 'this' pointer to the `callvirt` of `method`. - 如果`thisType`是值类型和`thisType`实现`method`然后`ptr`传递给 this 指针作为未修改`call``method`指令实现的`method`通过`thisType`.If `thisType` is a value type and `thisType` implements `method` then `ptr` is passed unmodified as the 'this' pointer to a `call` `method` instruction, for the implementation of `method` by `thisType`. - 如果`thisType`是值类型和`thisType`不实现`method`然后`ptr`被取消引用、 装箱，并指向 this 指针作为传递`callvirt``method`指令。If `thisType` is a value type and `thisType` does not implement `method` then `ptr` is dereferenced, boxed, and passed as the 'this' pointer to the `callvirt` `method` instruction. 此最后一种情况可能发生时，才`method`上定义， ，或不被重写`thisType`。This last case can occur only when `method` was defined on , , or and not overridden by `thisType`. 在这种情况下，装箱会导致要进行的原始对象的副本。In this case, the boxing causes a copy of the original object to be made. 但是，因为的方法都不能， ，和修改状态的对象，不能检测到这一事实。However, because none of the methods of , , and modify the state of the object, this fact cannot be detected. `constrained`前缀支持创建泛型代码的 IL 生成器。The `constrained` prefix supports IL generators that create generic code. 通常情况下`callvirt`指令不是值类型上有效。Normally the `callvirt` instruction is not valid on value types. 因此，需要 IL 编译器有效地执行上述在编译时，具体取决于的类型的 this 变换`ptr`和被调用的方法。Instead it is required that IL compilers effectively perform the 'this' transformation outlined above at compile time, depending on the type of `ptr` and the method being called. 但是，当`ptr`是在编译时是未知的泛型类型不是可以进行此转换在编译时。However, when `ptr` is a generic type that is unknown at compile time, it is not possible to make this transformation at compile time. `constrained`操作码允许 IL 编译器能够对虚拟函数的调用以统一方式独立于是否`ptr`是值类型还是引用类型。The `constrained` opcode allows IL compilers to make a call to a virtual function in a uniform way independent of whether `ptr` is a value type or a reference type. 虽然适用于这种情况，但其中`thisType`是泛型类型变量，`constrained`前缀还适用于非泛型类型，可以降低在隐藏值类型之间的区别的语言中生成虚拟调用的复杂性和引用类型。Although it is intended for the case where `thisType` is a generic type variable, the `constrained` prefix also works for nongeneric types and can reduce the complexity of generating virtual calls in languages that hide the distinction between value types and reference types. 使用`constrained`前缀还避免了值类型的潜在版本问题。Using the `constrained` prefix also avoids potential versioning problems with value types. 如果`constrained`不使用前缀，具体取决于是否是值类型重写 System.Object 的方法，必须发出不同的 IL。If the `constrained` prefix is not used, different IL must be emitted depending on whether or not a value type overrides a method of System.Object. 例如，如果值类型`V`object.tostring （） 方法中，将覆盖`call``V.ToString()`发出指令; 如果不是，请`box`指令和一个`callvirt``Object.ToString()`发出指令。For example, if a value type `V` overrides the Object.ToString() method, a `call` `V.ToString()` instruction is emitted; if it does not, a `box` instruction and a `callvirt` `Object.ToString()` instruction are emitted. 版本控制问题可能出现在前一种情况下如果稍后删除重写，并在后一种情况下，如果以后添加重写。A versioning problem can arise in the former case if the override is later removed, and in the latter case if an override is later added. `constrained`前缀还可调用接口方法上的值类型，因为可以使用更改实现接口方法的值类型方法`MethodImpl`。The `constrained` prefix can also be used for invocation of interface methods on value types, because the value type method implementing the interface method can be changed using a `MethodImpl`. 如果`constrained`不使用前缀，会强制编译器选择的值将在编译时绑定到的类型的方法。If the `constrained` prefix is not used, the compiler is forced to choose which of the value type's methods to bind to at compile time. 使用`constrained`前缀字符允许将绑定到在运行时，而不是在编译时实现的接口方法的方法的 MSIL。Using the `constrained` prefix allows the MSIL to bind to the method that implements the interface method at run time, rather than at compile time. 以下方法重载可使用`constrained`操作码：The following method overload can use the `constrained` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，Type）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Conv_I
Public Shared ReadOnly Conv_I As OpCode

summary.span: 将位于计算堆栈顶部的值转换为 。

span.span: Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D3D3|conv.iconv.i|将转换为`native int`、 推送`native int`堆栈上。Convert to `native int`, pushing `native int` on stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 将弹出堆栈和转换尝试执行操作。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 3. 如果转换成功，所得到的值推送到堆栈上。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.i`操作码将转换`value`操作码，然后将的转换后的堆栈顶部的值中指定的类型到堆栈顶部。The `conv.i` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and leave that converted value on the top of the stack. 小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`时加载到计算堆栈上 (除非`conv.i`或`conv.u`使用，则结果是这种情况下也是`native int`)。Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 浮点值转换为`F`类型。Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type. 从浮点数转换为整数值将向截断数字零。Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero. 从转换时`float64`到`float32`，精度可能会丢失。When converting from a `float64` to a `float32`, precision can be lost. 如果`value`太大而无法放入`float32 (F)`，正无穷大 (如果`value`为正值) 或负无穷大 (如果`value`为负) 返回。If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned. 如果转换到另一个的一个整数类型发生溢出时，高顺序位将被截断。If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated. 如果结果为小于`int32`，值将进行符号扩展，以填充槽。If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot. 如果发生溢出时将浮点类型转换为整数返回的值是未指定。If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the value returned is unspecified. 使用此字段时不会引发任何异常。No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field. 请参阅和为等效的结果类型不正确表示的结果值时将引发异常的说明。See and for equivalent instructions that will throw an exception when the result type can not properly represent the result value. 以下方法重载可使用`conv.i`操作码：The following method overload can use the `conv.i` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

span.span: Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to , then extends (pads) it to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6767|conv.i1conv.i1|将转换为`int8`、 推送`int32`堆栈上。Convert to `int8`, pushing `int32` on stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 将弹出堆栈和转换尝试执行操作。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 3. 如果转换成功，所得到的值推送到堆栈上。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.i1`操作码将转换`value`操作码，然后将的转换后的堆栈顶部的值中指定的类型到堆栈顶部。The `conv.i1` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and leave that converted value on the top of the stack. 小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`时加载到计算堆栈上 (除非`conv.i`或`conv.u`使用，则结果是这种情况下也是`native int`)。Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 浮点值转换为`F`类型。Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type. 从浮点数转换为整数值将向截断数字零。Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero. 从转换时`float64`到`float32`，精度可能会丢失。When converting from a `float64` to a `float32`, precision can be lost. 如果`value`太大而无法放入`float32 (F)`，正无穷大 (如果`value`为正值) 或负无穷大 (如果`value`为负) 返回。If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned. 如果转换到另一个的一个整数类型发生溢出时，高顺序位将被截断。If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated. 如果结果为小于`int32`，值将进行符号扩展，以填充槽。If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot. 如果发生溢出时将浮点类型转换为整数返回的值是未指定。If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the value returned is unspecified. 使用此字段时不会引发任何异常。No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field. 请参阅和为等效的结果类型不正确表示的结果值时将引发异常的说明。See and for equivalent instructions that will throw an exception when the result type can not properly represent the result value. 以下方法重载可使用`conv.i1`操作码：The following method overload can use the `conv.i1` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

span.span: Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to signed and extending it to , throwing on overflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |B5B5|conv.ovf.i2conv.ovf.i2|将转换为`int16`(在堆栈上为`int32`)，并在溢出时引发异常。Convert to an `int16` (on the stack as `int32`) and throw an exception on overflow.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 将弹出堆栈和转换尝试执行操作。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 如果发生溢出时，将引发异常。If overflow occurs, an exception is thrown. 3. 如果转换成功，所得到的值推送到堆栈上。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.ovf.i2`操作码将转换`value`操作码，并将转换后的堆栈顶部的值中指定的类型到堆栈顶部。The `conv.ovf.i2` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and places that converted value on the top of the stack. 如果值为太大或太小，无法表示的目标类型，将引发异常。If the value is too large or too small to be represented by the target type, an exception is thrown. 从浮点数转换为整数值将向截断数字零。Conversions from floating-point numbers to integer values truncate the number toward zero. 请注意小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`时加载到计算堆栈上 (除非`conv.ovf.i`或`conv.ovf.u`习惯，在这种情况下结果也是`native int`)。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.ovf.i` or `conv.ovf.u` are used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 如果不可以结果类型中表示的结果，引发。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 以下方法重载可使用`conv.ovf.i2`操作码：The following method overload can use the `conv.ovf.i2` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |B4B4|conv.ovf.u1conv.ovf.u1|将转换为`unsigned int8`(在堆栈上为`int32`)，并在溢出时引发异常。Convert to an `unsigned int8` (on the stack as `int32`) and throw an exception on overflow.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 将弹出堆栈和转换尝试执行操作。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 如果发生溢出时，将引发异常。If overflow occurs, an exception is thrown. 3. 如果转换成功，所得到的值推送到堆栈上。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.ovf.u1`操作码将转换`value`操作码，并将转换后的堆栈顶部的值中指定的类型到堆栈顶部。The `conv.ovf.u1` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and places that converted value on the top of the stack. 如果值为太大或太小，无法表示的目标类型，将引发异常。If the value is too large or too small to be represented by the target type, an exception is thrown. 从浮点数转换为整数值将向截断数字零。Conversions from floating-point numbers to integer values truncate the number toward zero. 请注意小于 4 个字节的整数值扩展到`int32`时加载到计算堆栈上 (除非`conv.ovf.i`或`conv.ovf.u`习惯，在这种情况下结果也是`native int`)。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.ovf.i` or `conv.ovf.u` are used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 如果不可以结果类型中表示的结果，引发。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 以下方法重载可使用`conv.ovf.u1`操作码：The following method overload can use the `conv.ovf.u1` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
