Public Shared ReadOnly Ldnull As OpCode

summary.span: 将空引用（ 类型）推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes a null reference (type ) onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |1414|ldnullldnull|推送到堆栈上的为空引用push a null reference onto the stack| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 空对象引用推送到堆栈上。A null object reference is pushed onto the stack. `ldnull` 将推送空引用 (类型`O`) 在堆栈上。`ldnull` pushes a null reference (type `O`) on the stack. 这用于初始化位置之前它们填充了数据，或被拒绝时。This is used to initialize locations before they are populated with data, or when they become deprecated. `ldnull` 提供与大小无关的 null 引用。`ldnull` provides a null reference that is size-independent. 以下方法重载可使用`ldnull`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldnull` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldobj
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldobj As OpCode

summary.span: 将地址指向的值类型对象复制到计算堆栈的顶部。

span.span: Copies the value type object pointed to by an address to the top of the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |71 < `T` >71 < `T` >|ldobj `class`ldobj `class`|值类型的复制实例`class`到堆栈。Copy instance of value type `class` to the stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 值类型对象的地址推送到堆栈上。The address of a value type object is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出该地址并查找在该特定地址的实例。The address is popped from the stack and the instance at that particular address is looked up. 3. 在该位置存储的对象的值推送到堆栈上。The value of the object stored at that address is pushed onto the stack. `ldobj`指令用于作为参数传递值类型。The `ldobj` instruction is used to pass a value type as a parameter. `ldobj`指令将指向的值复制`addrOfValObj`(类型的`&`， `*`，或`native int`) 到堆栈的顶部。The `ldobj` instruction copies the value pointed to by `addrOfValObj` (of type `&`, `*`, or `native int`) to the top of the stack. 复制的字节数取决于类的大小 (所指定的`class`参数)。The number of bytes copied depends on the size of the class (as specified by the `class` parameter). `class`参数是表示值类型的元数据标记。The `class` parameter is a metadata token representing the value type. 操作`ldobj`指令可更改紧跟其后或前缀指令。The operation of the `ldobj` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding or prefix instruction. 如果找不到类将引发。 is thrown if class cannot be found. 在 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令将转换为本机代码，而不是在运行时，通常是检测到此问题。This is typically detected when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instruction is converted to native code rather than at runtime. 以下方法重载可使用`ldobj`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldobj` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，Type）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldsfld
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldsfld As OpCode

summary.span: 将静态字段的值推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes the value of a static field onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7E < `T` >7E < `T` >|ldsfld `field`ldsfld `field`|将的值推入`field`在堆栈上。Push the value of `field` on the stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 特定字段的值推送到堆栈上。The value of the specific field is pushed onto the stack. `ldsfld`指令将静态 （在类的所有实例间共享） 的值推到堆栈上的字段。The `ldsfld` instruction pushes the value of a static (shared among all instances of a class) field on the stack. 与传递的元数据令牌相关联的返回类型是`field`。The return type is that associated with the passed metadata token `field`. `ldsfld`指令可以有前缀。The `ldsfld` instruction can have a prefix. 以下方法重载可使用`ldsfld`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldsfld` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，FieldInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldsflda
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldsflda As OpCode

summary.span: 将静态字段的地址推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes the address of a static field onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7F < `T` >7F < `T` >|ldsflda `field`ldsflda `field`|推送的地址`field`在堆栈上Push the address of `field` on the stack| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 特定字段的地址推送到堆栈上。The address of a specific field is pushed onto the stack. `ldsflda`指令将静态 （在类的所有实例间共享） 的地址推送到堆栈上的字段。The `ldsflda` instruction pushes the address of a static (shared among all instances of a class) field on the stack. 该地址可表示为瞬态指针 (类型`*`) 如果元数据标记`field`引用的类型来管理其内存。The address may be represented as a transient pointer (type `*`) if the metadata token `field` refers to a type whose memory is managed. 否则，它对应于非托管指针 (类型`native int`)。Otherwise, it corresponds to an unmanaged pointer (type `native int`). 请注意，`field`可以是静态分配有相对虚拟地址 （此时其包含的 PE 文件加载到内存中的基址中的字段的偏移量） 全局内存是非托管。Note that `field` may be a static global with an assigned relative virtual address (the offset of the field from the base address at which its containing PE file is loaded into memory) where the memory is unmanaged. `ldsflda`指令可以有前缀。The `ldsflda` instruction can have a prefix. 如果在元数据中找不到字段会引发。 is thrown if field is not found in the metadata. 选中此项是通常在 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令转换为本机代码，而非运行时。This is typically checked when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, not at runtime. 以下方法重载可使用`ldsflda`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldsflda` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，FieldInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldstr
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldstr As OpCode

summary.span: 推送对元数据中存储的字符串的新对象引用。

span.span: Pushes a new object reference to a string literal stored in the metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |72 < `T` >72 < `T` >|ldstr `mdToken`ldstr `mdToken`|推送的元数据字符串标记的字符串对象`mdToken`。Pushes a string object for the metadata string token `mdToken`.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 对字符串的对象引用推送到堆栈上。An object reference to a string is pushed onto the stack. `ldstr`指令将推送的对象引用 (类型`O`) 到表示存储在元数据中的特定字符串文本的新字符串对象。The `ldstr` instruction pushes an object reference (type `O`) to a new string object representing the specific string literal stored in the metadata. `ldstr`指令分配必需的内存量并执行将字符串文字转换为在运行时所需的字符串格式的文件中使用窗体中所需的任何格式转换。The `ldstr` instruction allocates the requisite amount of memory and performs any format conversion required to convert the string literal from the form used in the file to the string format required at runtime. 公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 可保证两个结果`ldstr`说明两个具有相同的字符序列的元数据标记引用返回相同的字符串对象 （称为"字符串暂留"的过程）。The Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) guarantees that the result of two `ldstr` instructions referring to two metadata tokens that have the same sequence of characters return precisely the same string object (a process known as "string interning"). 以下方法重载可使用`ldstr`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldstr` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，字符串）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, string)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldtoken
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldtoken As OpCode

summary.span: 将元数据标记转换为其运行时表示形式，并将其推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Converts a metadata token to its runtime representation, pushing it onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D0 < `T` >D0 < `T` >|ldtoken `token`ldtoken `token`|将元数据标记转换为其运行时表示形式。Converts a metadata token to its runtime representation.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 传入的令牌转换为`RuntimeHandle`并将其推送到堆栈上。The passed token is converted to a `RuntimeHandle` and pushed onto the stack. `ldtoken`指令推送`RuntimeHandle`指定的元数据令牌。The `ldtoken` instruction pushes a `RuntimeHandle` for the specified metadata token. 一个`RuntimeHandle`可以是`fieldref/fielddef`即`methodref/methoddef`，或`typeref/typedef`。A `RuntimeHandle` can be a `fieldref/fielddef`, a `methodref/methoddef`, or a `typeref/typedef`. 推送到堆栈上的值可用于调用`Reflection`系统类库中的方法。The value pushed on the stack can be used in calls to `Reflection` methods in the system class library. 对运行时句柄的信息，请参阅以下类： ， ，和。For information on runtime handles, see the following classes: , , and . 以下方法重载可使用`ldtoken`操作码：The following method overloads can use the `ldtoken` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，MethodInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo) - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，FieldInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo) - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，Type）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldvirtftn
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldvirtftn As OpCode

summary.span: 将指向实现与指定对象关联的特定虚方法的本机代码的非托管指针（ 类型）推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes an unmanaged pointer (type ) to the native code implementing a particular virtual method associated with a specified object onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 07 < `T` >FE 07 < `T` >|ldvirtftn `method`ldvirtftn `method`|将对象的虚方法的指针`method`在堆栈上。Pushes the pointer to an object's virtual method `method` on the stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个对象引用推送到堆栈上。An object reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 对象引用对方法从堆栈和入口点的地址中弹出 (所指定的元数据标记`method`) 查找。The object reference is popped from the stack and the address of the entry point to the method (as specified by the metadata token `method`) is looked up. 3. 将指针与`method`推送到堆栈上。The pointer to `method` is pushed onto the stack. 生成的非托管的指针推送到堆栈中，按`ldvirtftn`可以使用调用指令指令，如果它所引用的托管的方法 （或从非托管代码到托管代码转换的存根）。The resulting unmanaged pointer pushed onto the stack by the `ldvirtftn` instruction can be called using the instruction if it references a managed method (or a stub that transitions from managed to unmanaged code). 非托管的指针指向本机代码中使用 CLR 调用约定。The unmanaged pointer points to native code using the CLR calling convention. 作为回调例程之前，不应将此方法指针传递到非托管本机代码。This method pointer should not be passed to unmanaged native code as a callback routine. 以下方法重载可使用`ldvirtftn`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ldvirtftn` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，MethodInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Leave
Public Shared ReadOnly Leave As OpCode

summary.span: 退出受保护的代码区域，无条件将控制转移到特定目标指令。

span.span: Exits a protected region of code, unconditionally transferring control to a specific target instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |DD < `int32` >DD < `int32` >|将保留 `target`leave `target`|退出受保护的代码区域。Exits a protected region of code.| 不没有为此指令指定任何堆栈转换行为。There is no stack transition behavior specified for this instruction. `leave`指令无条件将控制转移到特定目标指令，表示为 4 字节有符号偏移量，从当前指令之后的指令的开头。The `leave` instruction unconditionally transfers control to the specific target instruction, represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. `leave`指令是类似于`br`指令，但它可用于退出`try`， `filter`，或`catch`块，而普通分支指令可以仅用于此类块中传输中的控件它。The `leave` instruction is similar to the `br` instruction, but it can be used to exit a `try`, `filter`, or `catch` block whereas the ordinary branch instructions can only be used in such a block to transfer control within it. `leave`指令会清空计算堆栈，并确保周围的适当`finally`块被执行。The `leave` instruction empties the evaluation stack and ensures that the appropriate surrounding `finally` blocks are executed. 不能使用`leave`指令，以退出`finally`块。You cannot use a `leave` instruction to exit a `finally` block. 为了简化在 catch 块以使用有效的方法是异常处理程序的代码生成`leave`指令将控制转移到中关联的任何指令`try`块。To ease code generation for exception handlers it is valid from within a catch block to use a `leave` instruction to transfer control to any instruction within the associated `try` block. 如果一条指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则仅将控制转移到第一个上述前缀之一。If an instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 以下方法重载可使用`leave`操作码：The following method overloads can use the `leave` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，标签）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Leave_S
Public Shared ReadOnly Leave_S As OpCode

summary.span: 退出受保护的代码区域，无条件将控制转移到目标指令（缩写形式）。

span.span: Exits a protected region of code, unconditionally transferring control to a target instruction (short form).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |DE < `int8` >DE < `int8` >|leave.s `target`leave.s `target`|退出代码中，缩写形式的受保护的区域。Exit a protected region of code, short form.| 不没有为此指令指定任何堆栈转换行为。There is no stack transition behavior specified for this instruction. `leave.s`指令无条件将控制转移到传递的目标指令，表示为 1 字节有符号偏移量，从当前指令之后的指令的开头。The `leave.s` instruction unconditionally transfers control to the passed target instruction, represented as a 1-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. `leave.s`指令是类似于`br`指令，但它可用于退出`try`， `filter`，或`catch`块，而普通分支指令可以仅用于此类块中传输中的控件它。The `leave.s` instruction is similar to the `br` instruction, but it can be used to exit a `try`, `filter`, or `catch` block whereas the ordinary branch instructions can only be used in such a block to transfer control within it. `leave.s`指令会清空计算堆栈，并确保周围的适当`finally`块被执行。The `leave.s` instruction empties the evaluation stack and ensures that the appropriate surrounding `finally` blocks are executed. 不能使用`leave.s`指令，以退出`finally`块。You cannot use a `leave.s` instruction to exit a `finally` block. 为了简化在 catch 块以使用有效的方法是异常处理程序的代码生成`leave.s`指令将控制转移到中关联的任何指令`try`块。To ease code generation for exception handlers it is valid from within a catch block to use a `leave.s` instruction to transfer control to any instruction within the associated `try` block. 如果一条指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则仅将控制转移到第一个上述前缀之一。If an instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 以下方法重载可使用`leave.s`操作码：The following method overload can use the `leave.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，标签）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Localloc
Public Shared ReadOnly Localloc As OpCode

summary.span: 从本地动态内存池分配特定数目的字节并将第一个分配的字节的地址（瞬态指针， 类型）推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Allocates a certain number of bytes from the local dynamic memory pool and pushes the address (a transient pointer, type ) of the first allocated byte onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 0FFE 0F|localloclocalloc|从本地堆中分配空间。Allocate space from the local heap.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 要分配的字节数推送到堆栈上。The number of bytes to be allocated is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出的字节数本地堆分配的大小对应的内存量。The number of bytes is popped from the stack; an amount of memory corresponding to the size is allocated from the local heap. 3. 指向已分配的内存的第一个字节的指针推送到堆栈上。A pointer to the first byte of the allocated memory is pushed onto the stack. `localloc`指令分配`size`(类型`natural unsigned int`) 个字节从本地动态内存池，并返回的地址 (瞬态指针，类型`*`) 的第一个分配的字节。The `localloc` instruction allocates `size` (type `natural unsigned int`) bytes from the local dynamic memory pool and returns the address (a transient pointer, type `*`) of the first allocated byte. 内存块返回初始化为 0，仅当该方法中的初始化标志为`true`。The block of memory returned is initialized to 0 only if the initialize flag on the method is `true`. 当执行当前方法，本地内存池可供重复使用。When the current method executes a , the local memory pool is made available for reuse. 生成的地址，以使任何基元数据类型可以存储那里使用对齐`stind`的说明 (如) 和使用加载`ldind`说明 (如)。The resulting address is aligned so that any primitive data type can be stored there using the `stind` instructions (such as ) and loaded using the `ldind` instructions (such as ). `localloc`指令不能出现在`filter`， `catch`， `finally`，或`fault`块。The `localloc` instruction cannot occur within a `filter`, `catch`, `finally`, or `fault` block. 如果没有足够的内存来为请求提供服务将引发。 is thrown if there is insufficient memory to service the request. 以下方法重载可使用`localloc`操作码：The following method overload can use the `localloc` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Mkrefany
Public Shared ReadOnly Mkrefany As OpCode

summary.span: 将对特定类型实例的类型化引用推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes a typed reference to an instance of a specific type onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |C6 < `T` >C6 < `T` >|mkrefany `class`mkrefany `class`|将类型的类型化的引用推送`class`到堆栈上。Pushes a typed reference of type `class` onto the stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个指向数据片段推送到堆栈上。A pointer to piece of data is pushed onto the stack. 2. 弹出指针并将其转换为的类型化引用`class`。The pointer is popped and converted to a typed reference of type `class`. 3. 类型化的引用推送到堆栈上。The typed reference is pushed onto the stack. `mkrefany`指令支持动态类型化的引用传递。The `mkrefany` instruction supports the passing of dynamically typed references. 类型必须为指针`&`， `*`，或`native int`，并且保留一段数据的有效地址。The pointer must be of type `&`, `*`, or `native int`, and hold the valid address of a piece of data. `Class` 类令牌描述类型的指针所引用的数据。`Class` is the class token describing the type of the data referenced by the pointer. `Mkrefany` 将类型化的引用推送到堆栈上，提供的不透明指针和类型描述符`class`。`Mkrefany` pushes a typed reference on the stack, providing an opaque descriptor of the pointer and the type `class`. 允许对类型化引用的唯一有效操作是将其传递给需要作为参数的类型化的引用的方法。The only valid operation permitted upon a typed reference is to pass it to a method that requires a typed reference as a parameter. 然后可以使用被调用方和分别检索类型 （类） 和地址的说明。The callee can then use the and instructions to retrieve the type (class) and the address respectively. 如果引发`class`找不到。 is thrown if `class` cannot be found. 在 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令转换为本机代码，而不是在运行时，通常是检测到此问题。This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code rather than at runtime. 以下方法重载可使用`mkrefany`操作码：The following method overload can use the `mkrefany` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，Type）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Mul
Public Shared ReadOnly Mul As OpCode

summary.span: 将两个值相乘并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Multiplies two values and pushes the result on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5A5A|mulmul|将在堆栈上的两个值相乘。Multiplies two values on the stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈中弹出`value1`乘以`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is multiplied by `value2`. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `mul`指令将乘以`value1`通过`value2`并将结果推送到堆栈上。The `mul` instruction multiplies `value1` by `value2` and pushes the result on the stack. 整数运算以无提示方式截断在溢出较高的位。Integer operations silently truncate the upper bits on overflow. 请参阅整数特定的乘法运算，而不进行溢出处理。See for an integer-specific multiply operation with overflow handling. 对浮点类型，0 \* 无穷大 = NaN。For floating-point types, 0 \* infinity = NaN. 以下方法重载可使用`mul`操作码：The following method overload can use the `mul` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Mul_Ovf
Public Shared ReadOnly Mul_Ovf As OpCode

summary.span: 将两个整数值相乘，执行溢出检查，并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Multiplies two integer values, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D8D8|mul.ovfmul.ovf|将具有溢出检查的堆栈上的两个整数值相乘。Multiplies two integer values on the stack with an overflow check.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈中弹出`value1`乘以`value2`，并进行溢出检查。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is multiplied by `value2`, with an overflow check. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `mul.ovf`指令将整数相乘`value1`由整数`value2`并将结果推送到堆栈上。The `mul.ovf` instruction multiplies integer `value1` by integer `value2` and pushes the result on the stack. 如果结果将不符合要求的结果类型，将引发异常。An exception is thrown if the result will not fit in the result type. 如果不可以结果类型中表示的结果，引发。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 以下方法重载可使用`mul.ovf`操作码：The following method overload can use the `mul.ovf` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Mul_Ovf_Un
Public Shared ReadOnly Mul_Ovf_Un As OpCode

summary.span: 将两个无符号整数值相乘，执行溢出检查，并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Multiplies two unsigned integer values, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D9D9|mul.ovf.unmul.ovf.un|并进行溢出检查堆栈上的两个无符号的值相乘。Multiplies two unsigned values on the stack with an overflow check.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`从堆栈中弹出`value1`乘以`value2`，并进行溢出检查。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is multiplied by `value2`, with an overflow check. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `mul.ovf.un`指令将无符号的整数相乘`value1`由无符号整数`value2`并将结果推送到堆栈上。The `mul.ovf.un` instruction multiplies unsigned integer `value1` by unsigned integer `value2` and pushes the result on the stack. 如果结果将不符合要求的结果类型，将引发异常。An exception is thrown if the result will not fit in the result type. 如果不可以结果类型中表示的结果，引发。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 以下方法重载可使用`mul.ovf.un`操作码：The following method overload can use the `mul.ovf.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Neg
Public Shared ReadOnly Neg As OpCode

summary.span: 对一个值执行求反并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Negates a value and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6565|negneg|当前位于堆栈顶部值求反。Negates the value currently on top of the stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 值是从堆栈中弹出，取反。A value is popped from the stack and negated. 3. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `neg`指令求反值，并将结果位于堆栈顶部推送。The `neg` instruction negates value and pushes the result on top of the stack. 返回类型是操作数类型相同。The return type is the same as the operand type. 求反运算的整数值是标准 2 的补数求反运算。Negation of integral values is standard two's complement negation. 具体而言，而取消最小数量 （这不具有正对应） 得到的最小数量。In particular, negating the most negative number (which does not have a positive counterpart) yields the most negative number. 若要检测此溢出，请改用指令相反 （即，从 0 减）。To detect this overflow use the instruction instead (that is, subtract from 0). 无法溢出而取消浮点数，并从而抵消 NaN 返回 NaN。Negating a floating-point number cannot overflow, and negating NaN returns NaN. 以下方法重载可使用`neg`操作码：The following method overload can use the `neg` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Newarr
Public Shared ReadOnly Newarr As OpCode

summary.span: 将对新的从零开始的一维数组（其元素属于特定类型）的对象引用推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes an object reference to a new zero-based, one-dimensional array whose elements are of a specific type onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |8D < `T` >8D < `T` >|newarr `etype`newarr `etype`|创建一个新数组的元素的类型`etype`。Creates a new array with elements of type `etype`.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 数组中元素的数目推送到堆栈上。The number of elements in the array is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出的元素数和创建数组。The number of elements is popped from the stack and the array is created. 3. 对新数组的对象引用推送到堆栈上。An object reference to the new array is pushed onto the stack. `newarr`指令将推送的对象引用 (类型`O`) 到新的从零开始的、 一维数组，将其元素是类型的`etype`（描述类型的元数据标记）。The `newarr` instruction pushes an object reference (type `O`) to a new zero-based, one-dimensional array whose elements are of type `etype` (a metadata token describing the type). 新数组中的元素的数量应指定为`native int`。The number of elements in the new array should be specified as a `native int`. 有效的数组索引范围是从 0 到减一的元素的最大数目。Valid array indexes range from zero to the maximum number of elements minus one. 数组的元素可以是任何类型，包括值类型。The elements of an array can be any type, including value types. 使用引用相应的值类型的元数据标记创建的数字的对象的从零开始的一维数组 (，依此类推)。Zero-based, one-dimensional arrays of numbers are created using a metadata token referencing the appropriate value type (, and so on). 数组的元素将初始化为 0 的适当的类型。Elements of the array are initialized to 0 of the appropriate type. 使用创建非从零开始的一维数组和多维数组而非`newarr`。Nonzero-based one-dimensional arrays and multidimensional arrays are created using rather than `newarr`. 更常见的是，使用的方法创建它们.NET Framework 中的类。More commonly, they are created using the methods of the class in the .NET Framework. 如果没有足够的内存来满足该请求将引发。 is thrown if there is insufficient memory to satisfy the request. 如果引发`numElems`小于 0。 is thrown if `numElems` is less than 0. 以下方法重载可使用`newarr`操作码：The following method overload can use the `newarr` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，Type）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Newobj
Public Shared ReadOnly Newobj As OpCode

summary.span: 创建一个值类型的新对象或新实例，并将对象引用（ 类型）推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Creates a new object or a new instance of a value type, pushing an object reference (type ) onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |73 < `T` >73 < `T` >|newobj `ctor`newobj `ctor`|分配未初始化的对象或值类型和调用构造函数方法`ctor`。Allocates an uninitialized object or value type and calls the constructor method `ctor`.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 自变量`arg1`通过`argn`序列中推送到堆栈上。Arguments `arg1` through `argn` are pushed on the stack in sequence. 2. 自变量`argn`通过`arg1`从堆栈中弹出和传递给`ctor`创建对象。Arguments `argn` through `arg1` are popped from the stack and passed to `ctor` for object creation. 3. 对新对象的引用推送到堆栈上。A reference to the new object is pushed onto the stack. `newobj`指令会创建一个新的对象或值类型的新实例。The `newobj` instruction creates a new object or a new instance of a value type. `Ctor` 为元数据标记 (`methodref`或`methoddef`必须标记为作为构造函数)，它指示名称、 类和要调用的构造函数的签名。`Ctor` is a metadata token (a `methodref` or `methoddef` that must be marked as a constructor) that indicates the name, class and signature of the constructor to call. `newobj`指令会分配与关联的类的新实例`ctor`并初始化为 0 （或适当的类型） 或空引用作为相应的新实例中的所有字段。The `newobj` instruction allocates a new instance of the class associated with `ctor` and initializes all the fields in the new instance to 0 (of the proper type) or null references as appropriate. 然后，它调用构造函数`ctor`与给定的参数以及新创建的实例。It then calls the constructor `ctor` with the given arguments along with the newly created instance. 调用的构造函数后，将新初始化的对象引用 (类型`O`) 推送到堆栈上。After the constructor has been called, the now initialized object reference (type `O`) is pushed on the stack. 从构造函数的角度来看，未初始化的对象是参数 0 并且传递给 newobj 的其他参数遵循顺序。From the constructor's point of view, the uninitialized object is argument 0 and the other arguments passed to newobj follow in order. 使用创建所有从零开始的一维数组，而不`newobj`。All zero-based, one-dimensional arrays are created using , not `newobj`. 但是，所有其他 （更多维度，或一维但不是从零开始） 创建了数组使用`newobj`。On the other hand, all other arrays (more than one dimension, or one-dimensional but not zero-based) are created using `newobj`. 值类型通常不创建使用`newobj`。Value types are not usually created using `newobj`. 它们通常分配作为参数或局部变量，使用`newarr`（适用于从零开始的一维数组），或作为对象的字段。They are usually allocated either as arguments or local variables, using `newarr` (for zero-based, one-dimensional arrays), or as fields of objects. 分配后，它们将初始化使用。Once allocated, they are initialized using . 但是，`newobj`指令可用于创建在堆栈中，然后可以作为自变量，存储在本地，并因此在传递值类型的新实例。However, the `newobj` instruction can be used to create a new instance of a value type on the stack, that can then be passed as an argument, stored in a local, and so on. 如果没有足够的内存来满足该请求将引发。 is thrown if there is insufficient memory to satisfy the request. 如果构造函数方法，将引发`ctor`使用指定的名称，类和签名未找到。 is thrown if a constructor method `ctor` with the indicated name, class and signature could not be found. 在 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令转换为本机代码，而不是在运行时，通常是检测到此问题。This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, rather than at runtime. 以下方法重载可使用`newobj`操作码：The following method overload can use the `newobj` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，ConstructorInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, ConstructorInfo)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Nop
Public Shared ReadOnly Nop As OpCode

summary.span: 如果修补操作码，则填充空间。

span.span: Fills space if opcodes are patched.

summary.span: 尽管可能消耗处理周期，但未执行任何有意义的操作。

span.span: No meaningful operation is performed although a processing cycle can be consumed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0000|nopnop|执行的操作而无需行为。Performs an operation without behavior.| 为此指令定义没有堆栈转换行为。There is no stack transitional behavior defined for this instruction. `nop`操作不起作用。The `nop` operation does nothing. 它用于填充空间中，如果修补操作码。It is intended to fill in space if opcodes are patched. 以下方法重载可使用`nop`操作码：The following method overload can use the `nop` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly Not As OpCode

summary.span: 计算堆栈顶部整数值的按位求补并将结果作为相同的类型推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Computes the bitwise complement of the integer value on top of the stack and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack as the same type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6666|notnot|计算一个值的按位求补。Computes the bitwise complement of a value.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 将弹出堆栈和其按位求补计算。`value` is popped from the stack and its bitwise complement computed. 3. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `not`指令计算整数值的按位求补并将推送到堆栈上的结果。The `not` instruction computes the bitwise complement of an integer value and pushes the result onto the stack. 返回类型是操作数类型相同。The return type is the same as the operand type. 以下方法重载可使用`not`操作码：The following method overload can use the `not` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly Or As OpCode

summary.span: 计算位于堆栈顶部的两个整数值的按位求补并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Compute the bitwise complement of the two integer values on top of the stack and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6060|或or|计算按位或两个整数值，返回一个整数。Computes the bitwise OR of two integer values, returns an integer.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`弹出，从堆栈和其位或计算。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and their bitwise OR computed. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `or`指令计算推送到堆栈上的结果位于堆栈上的两个值的按位 OR。The `or` instruction computes the bitwise OR of two values atop the stack, pushing the result onto the stack. `Or` 是特定于整数的操作。`Or` is an integer-specific operation. 以下方法重载可使用`or`操作码：The following method overload can use the `or` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly Pop As OpCode

summary.span: 移除当前位于计算堆栈顶部的值。

span.span: Removes the value currently on top of the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |2626|poppop|弹出从堆栈顶部的值。Pops the top value from the stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 位于顶部的值是从堆栈中弹出。The top value is popped from the stack. `pop`指令从堆栈中移除的顶级元素。The `pop` instruction removes the top element from the stack. 以下方法重载可使用`pop`操作码：The following method overload can use the `pop` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 指定后面的数组地址操作在运行时不执行类型检查，并且返回可变性受限的托管指针。

span.span: Specifies that the subsequent array address operation performs no type check at run time, and that it returns a managed pointer whose mutability is restricted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1EFE 1E|readonly。readonly.|指定后面的数组地址操作执行运行时，任何类型检查和它返回可变性受限的托管的指针。Specify that the subsequent array address operation performs no type check at run time, and that it returns a managed pointer with restricted mutability.| 此前缀只能出现前面紧邻`ldelema`指令，并对这两个特殊的调用`Address`阵列上的方法。This prefix can only appear immediately preceding the `ldelema` instruction and calls to the special `Address` method on arrays. 后续操作的影响是双重的：Its effect on the subsequent operation is twofold: 1. 在运行时，会不执行任何类型检查操作。At run time, no type check operation is performed. 请注意，通常为隐式类型检查`ldelema`和`stelem`说明在引用中使用时键入数组。Note that there is normally an implicit type check for the `ldelema` and `stelem` instructions when used on reference type arrays. 从来没有运行时类型检查的值类，因此`readonly`这种情况下是执行任何操作。There is never a run-time type check for value classes, so `readonly` is a no-op in that case. 2. 验证工具可变性受限的托管指针作为处理地址的操作的结果。The verifier treats the result of the address-of operation as a managed pointer with restricted mutability. 指针称为定义类型控制值的并且是否可转变，因此具有受限的可变性。The pointer is said to have restricted mutability because the defining type controls whether the value can be mutated. 对于公开的任何公共字段或更新的位置中的值的方法的值类，该指针是只读的 (因此前缀的名称)。For value classes that expose no public fields or methods that update the value in place, the pointer is read-only (hence the name of the prefix). 具体而言，表示基元类型 (例如，System.Int32) 的类不公开赋值函数，因此是只读的。In particular, the classes representing primitive types (for example, System.Int32) do not expose mutators and thus are read-only. 仅以下方式使用受限制的这种方式中的托管的指针：A managed pointer restricted in this fashion can be used only in the following ways: - 作为`object`参数`ldfld`， `ldflda`， `stfld`， `call`，或`constrained callvirt`说明。As the `object` parameter for the `ldfld`, `ldflda`, `stfld`, `call`, or`constrained callvirt` instructions. - 作为`pointer`参数`ldobj`指令或其中的某个`ldind`说明。As the `pointer` parameter to the `ldobj` instruction or to one of the `ldind` instructions. - 作为`source`参数`cpobj`指令。As the `source` parameter to the `cpobj` instruction. 所有其他操作不允许使用，包括`stobj`， `initobj`，或`mkrefany`操作，或任何`stind`说明。All other operations disallowed, including the `stobj`, `initobj`, or `mkrefany` operations, or any of the `stind` instructions. 用途`readonly`前缀是从泛型代码中的数组中提取元素时避免执行类型检查。The purpose of the `readonly` prefix is to avoid a type check when fetching an element from an array in generic code. 例如，表达式`arr[i].m()`，其中的元素类型数组`arr`是被约束为有一个接口，使用方法的泛型类型`m`，可能会编译成如下 MSIL。For example, the expression `arr[i].m()`, where the element type of the array `arr` is a generic type that has been constrained to have an interface with method `m`, might compile to the following MSIL. ``` ldloc arr ldloc i readonly. ldelema !0 // Loads the pointer to the object. … // Load the arguments to the call. constrained. !0 callvirt m ``` 无需`readonly`前缀，`ldelema`指令将在这种情况中执行类型检查其中 ！ 0 是引用类型。Without the `readonly` prefix, the `ldelema` instruction would perform a type check in the case where !0 was a reference type. 不只是这种类型检查低效的但在语义上不正确。Not only is this type check inefficient, but it is semantically incorrect. 类型检查`ldelema`是完全匹配，这是太强。The type check for `ldelema` is an exact match, which is too strong. 如果数组包含类型的子类 ！ 0，上面的代码将失败类型检查。If the array held subclasses of type !0, the code above would fail the type check. 数组元素的地址提取，而不是元素本身，以便具有的句柄`arr[i]`适用于这两值类型和引用类型，并因此可以传递给`constrained callvirt`指令。The address of the array element is fetched, instead of the element itself, in order to have a handle for `arr[i]` that works for both value types and reference types, and thus can be passed to the `constrained callvirt` instruction. 一般情况下是不安全，以跳过运行时检查，如果数组保留的引用类型的元素。In general it would be unsafe to skip the run-time check if the array held elements of a reference type. 为了安全起见，它是需要确保对数组做任何修改都通过此指针。To be safe, it is necessary to ensure that no modifications to the array are made through this pointer. 验证程序规则确保这一点。The verifier rules ensure this. 受限制的托管的指针可以作为实例方法调用的对象传递，因此它不是严格地说只读的值类型，但是没有任何类型的安全性问题对于值类型。The restricted managed pointer can be passed as the object of instance method calls, so it is not strictly speaking read-only for value types, but there is no type safety problem for value types. 以下方法重载可使用`readonly`操作码：The following method overload can use the `readonly` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Refanytype
Public Shared ReadOnly Refanytype As OpCode

summary.span: 检索嵌入在类型化引用内的类型标记。

span.span: Retrieves the type token embedded in a typed reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1DFE 1D|refanytyperefanytype|将推送存储在类型化引用的类型标记。Pushes the type token stored in a typed reference.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 值类型引用推送到堆栈上。A value type reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出的类型化的引用，并检索其相应的类型标记。The typed reference is popped from the stack and its corresponding type token retrieved. 3. 类型标记推送到堆栈上。The type token is pushed onto the stack. 类型化的引用包含类型标记和对象实例的地址。A typed reference contains a type token and an address to an object instance. `refanytype`指令检索嵌入在类型化引用内的类型标记。The `refanytype` instruction retrieves the type token embedded in the typed reference. 请参阅指令创建信息的类型化的引用。See the instruction for information on creating typed references. 以下方法重载可使用`refanytype`操作码：The following method overload can use the `refanytype` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Refanyval
Public Shared ReadOnly Refanyval As OpCode

summary.span: 检索嵌入在类型化引用内的地址（ 类型）。

span.span: Retrieves the address (type ) embedded in a typed reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |C2 < `T` >C2 < `T` >|refanyval `type`refanyval `type`|将推送存储在类型化引用内的地址。Pushes the address stored in a typed reference.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 值类型引用推送到堆栈上。A value type reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出的类型化的引用和检索相应的地址。The typed reference is popped from the stack and the corresponding address retrieved. 3. 地址推送到堆栈上。The address is pushed onto the stack. 类型化的引用包含类型标记和对象实例的地址。A typed reference contains a type token and an address to an object instance. `refanyval`指令检索嵌入在的地址类型化的引用。The `refanyval` instruction retrieves the address embedded in the a typed reference. 嵌入在堆栈上提供的类型化引用的类型必须匹配指定的类型`type`(元数据令牌`typedef`或`typeref`)。The type embedded in the typed reference supplied on the stack must match the type specified by `type` (a metadata token, either a `typedef` or a `typeref`). 请参阅相关内容的说明。See the instruction for related content. 如果将引发`type`不等同于存储中的类型引用的类型 (在这种情况下，`type`类提供给构造的指令所说的类型化的引用)。 is thrown if `type` is not identical to the type stored in the type reference (in this case, `type` is the class supplied to the instruction that constructed said typed reference). 如果引发`type`找不到。 is thrown if `type` cannot be found. 以下方法重载可使用`refanyval`操作码：The following method overload can use the `refanyval` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，Type）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Rem
Public Shared ReadOnly Rem As OpCode

summary.span: 将两个值相除并将余数推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Divides two values and pushes the remainder onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5D5D|remrem|推送后所得的余数`value1`通过`value2`到堆栈上。Pushes the remainder of dividing `value1` by `value2` onto the stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个`value1`推送到堆栈上。A `value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 并`value1`弹出，从堆栈的其余部分`value1` `div` `value2`计算。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and the remainder of `value1` `div` `value2` computed. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `result` = `value1` `rem` `value2` 满足以下条件：`result` = `value1` `rem` `value2` satisfies the following conditions: `result` = `value1` - `value2` `×` (`value1` `div` `value2`)，和：`result` = `value1` - `value2` `×` (`value1` `div` `value2`), and: 0 = | `result` | < | `value2` |，登录 (`result`) = 登录 (`value1`)，其中`div`是向零截断除法指令。0 = | `result` | < | `value2` |, sign(`result`) = sign(`value1`), where `div` is the division instruction that truncates towards zero. 如果`value2`为零或`value1`为的无穷大，结果为 NaN。If `value2` is zero or `value1` is infinity the result is NaN. 如果`value2`为无穷大，结果是`value1`(求反的`-infinity`)。If `value2` is infinity, the result is `value1` (negated for `-infinity`). 整数运算引发如果`value2`为零。Integral operations throw if `value2` is zero. 请注意，在基于 Intel 的平台计算时引发 (minint `rem` -1)。Note that on the Intel-based platforms an is thrown when computing (minint `rem` -1). 以下方法重载可使用`rem`操作码：The following method overload can use the `rem` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Rem_Un
Public Shared ReadOnly Rem_Un As OpCode

summary.span: 将两个无符号值相除并将余数推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Divides two unsigned values and pushes the remainder onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5E5E|rem.unrem.un|推送后所得的余数无符号`value1`的无符号`value2`到堆栈上。Pushes the remainder of dividing unsigned `value1` by unsigned `value2` onto the stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 并`value1`弹出，从堆栈的其余部分`value1` `div` `value2`计算。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and the remainder of `value1` `div` `value2` computed. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `result` = `value1` `rem.un` `value2` 满足以下条件：`result` = `value1` `rem.un` `value2` satisfies the following conditions: `result` = `value1` - `value2` x (`value1` `div.un` `value2`)，和：`result` = `value1` - `value2` x(`value1` `div.un` `value2`), and: 0 = `result` < `value2`，其中`div.un`是无符号的除法指令。0 = `result` < `value2`, where `div.un` is the unsigned division instruction. `rem.un`指令计算`result`并将其推送到堆栈上。The `rem.un` instruction computes `result` and pushes it on the stack. `Rem.un` 将其参数视为无符号整数，而会将它们视为为有符号的整数。`Rem.un` treats its arguments as unsigned integers, while treats them as signed integers. `Rem.un` 未指定为浮点数。`Rem.un` is unspecified for floating-point numbers. 整数运算引发如果`value2`为零。Integral operations throw if `value2` is zero. 以下方法重载可使用`rem.un`操作码：The following method overload can use the `rem.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ret
Public Shared ReadOnly Ret As OpCode

summary.span: 从当前方法返回，并将返回值（如果存在）从被调用方的计算堆栈推送到调用方的计算堆栈上。

span.span: Returns from the current method, pushing a return value (if present) from the callee's evaluation stack onto the caller's evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |2A2A|retret|从方法返回，可能返回一个值。Returns from method, possibly returning a value.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 从被调用方计算堆栈中弹出的返回值。The return value is popped from the callee evaluation stack. 2. 在步骤 1 中的返回值推送到调用方计算堆栈上。The return value obtained in step 1 is pushed onto the caller evaluation stack. 如果返回值不存在被调用方计算堆栈上，则返回任何值是 （对于被调用方或调用方方法没有堆栈转换行为）。If the return value is not present on the callee evaluation stack, no value is returned (no stack transition behaviors for either the callee or caller method). 类型的返回值，如果有，当前方法确定要从堆栈顶部并被复制到调用当前方法的方法的堆栈中提取值的类型。The type of the return value, if any, of the current method determines the type of value to be fetched from the top of the stack and copied onto the stack of the method that called the current method. 计算堆栈的当前方法必须是空 （要返回的值除外）。The evaluation stack for the current method must be empty except for the value to be returned. `ret`指令不能用于将控制转移出`try`， `filter`， `catch`，或`finally`块。The `ret` instruction cannot be used to transfer control out of a`try`, `filter`, `catch`, or `finally` block. 从内部`try`或`catch`，使用指令的目标`ret`是所有封闭异常块的外部的指令。From within a `try` or `catch`, use the instruction with a destination of a `ret` instruction that is outside all enclosing exception blocks. 因为`filter`和`finally`块逻辑上属于异常处理和不在其中嵌入其代码的方法，正确生成的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令不执行方法中返回从`filter`或`finally`。Because the `filter` and `finally` blocks are logically part of exception handling and not the method in which their code is embedded, correctly generated Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions do not perform a method return from within a `filter` or `finally`. 以下方法重载可使用`ret`操作码：The following method overload can use the `ret` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Rethrow
Public Shared ReadOnly Rethrow As OpCode

summary.span: 再次引发当前异常。

span.span: Rethrows the current exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1AFE 1A|重新引发rethrow|重新引发当前异常Rethrows the current exception| 为此指令不定义了任何堆栈转换行为。No stack transition behavior is defined for this instruction. `rethrow`指令仅允许主体内`catch`处理程序。The `rethrow` instruction is only permitted within the body of a `catch` handler. 它将引发此处理程序捕获相同的异常。It throws the same exception that was caught by this handler. 以下方法重载可使用`rethrow`操作码：The following method overload can use the `rethrow` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Shl
Public Shared ReadOnly Shl As OpCode

summary.span: 将整数值左移（用零填充）指定的位数，并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Shifts an integer value to the left (in zeroes) by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6262|shlshl|将左移 （用零移位） 整数。Shifts an integer to the left (shifting in zeros).| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 要移动的比特数目推送到堆栈上。The amount of bits to be shifted is pushed onto the stack. 3. 从堆栈中弹出的要移动的位数和值指定数目的位向左移动值。The number of bits to be shifted and the value are popped from the stack; the value is shifted left by the specified number of bits. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `shl`指令右移值 (类型`int32`，`int64`或`native int`) 指定数目的位向左。The `shl` instruction shifts the value (type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`) left by the specified number of bits. 比特数是类型的值`int32`或`native int`。The number of bits is a value of type `int32` or `native int`. 如果要移动的位数是大于或等于提供的值的宽度 （以位为单位），返回值为未指定。The return value is unspecified if the number of bits to be shifted is greater than or equal to the width (in bits) of the supplied value. `Shl` 在每个班次上最低的位置中插入零位。`Shl` inserts a zero bit in the lowest position on each shift. 以下方法重载可使用`shl`操作码：The following method overload can use the `shl` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Shr
Public Shared ReadOnly Shr As OpCode

summary.span: 将整数值右移（保留符号）指定的位数，并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Shifts an integer value (in sign) to the right by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6363|shrshr|将一个整数 （保留符号移位） 左移。Shifts an integer to the right (shifting in sign).| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 要移动的比特数目推送到堆栈上。The amount of bits to be shifted is pushed onto the stack. 3. 从堆栈中弹出的要移动的位数和值值按指定位数向右位移。The number of bits to be shifted and the value are popped from the stack; the value is shifted right by the specified number of bits. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `shr.un`指令右移值 (类型`int32`，`int64`或`native int`) 权限的指定数目的位。The `shr.un` instruction shifts the value (type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`) right by the specified number of bits. 比特数是类型的值`int32`或`native int`。The number of bits is a value of type `int32` or `native int`. 如果要移动的位数是大于或等于提供的值的宽度 （以位为单位），返回值为未指定。The return value is unspecified if the number of bits to be shifted is greater than or equal to the width (in bits) of the supplied value. `Shr` 复制在每个班次，保留原始值中的符号的高序位`result`。`Shr` replicates the high order bit on each shift, preserving the sign of the original value in the `result`. 以下方法重载可使用`shr`操作码：The following method overload can use the `shr` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly Shr_Un As OpCode

summary.span: 将无符号整数值右移（用零填充）指定的位数，并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Shifts an unsigned integer value (in zeroes) to the right by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6464|shr.unshr.un|将一个整数 （用零填充移位） 左移。Shifts an integer to the right (shifting in zeroes).| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 要移动的比特数目推送到堆栈上。The amount of bits to be shifted is pushed onto the stack. 3. 从堆栈中弹出的要移动的位数和值值按指定位数向右位移。The number of bits to be shifted and the value are popped from the stack; the value is shifted right by the specified number of bits. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `shr.un`指令右移值 (类型`int32`，`int64`或`native int`) 权限的指定数目的位。The `shr.un` instruction shifts the value (type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`) right by the specified number of bits. 比特数是类型的值`int32`，`int64`或`native int`。The number of bits is a value of type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`. 如果要移动的位数是大于或等于提供的值的宽度 （以位为单位），返回值为未指定。The return value is unspecified if the number of bits to be shifted is greater than or equal to the width (in bits) of the supplied value. `Shr.un` 在每个班次的最高位置插入零位。`Shr.un` inserts a zero bit in the highest position on each shift. 以下方法重载可使用`shr.un`操作码：The following method overload can use the `shr.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly Sizeof As OpCode

summary.span: 将提供的值类型的大小（以字节为单位）推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes the size, in bytes, of a supplied value type onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1C < `T` >FE 1C < `T` >|sizeof `valType`sizeof `valType`|推送大小，以字节为单位的值类型作为`unsigned int32`。Push the size, in bytes, of a value type as an `unsigned int32`.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 提供的值类型的大小 （以字节为单位） (`valType`) 推送到堆栈上。The size (in bytes) of the supplied value type (`valType`) is pushed onto the stack. `valType` 必须是元数据标记 (`typeref`或`typedef`)，它指定值类型、 引用类型或泛型类型参数。`valType` must be a metadata token (a `typeref` or `typedef`) that specifies a value type, reference type, or generic type parameter. 对于引用类型，返回的大小是相应的参考值的大小类型 （32 位系统上为 4 字节），不是引用的引用值对象中存储的数据的大小。For a reference type, the size returned is the size of a reference value of the corresponding type (4 bytes on 32-bit systems), not the size of the data stored in objects referred to by the reference value. 可以仅在类型或其定义的方法的主体中使用泛型类型参数。A generic type parameter can be used only in the body of the type or method that defines it. 该类型或方法实例化时，泛型类型参数将替换为值类型或引用类型。When that type or method is instantiated, the generic type parameter is replaced by a value type or reference type. 以下方法重载可使用`sizeof`操作码：The following method overload can use the `sizeof` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，Type）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Starg
Public Shared ReadOnly Starg As OpCode

summary.span: 将位于计算堆栈顶部的值存储到位于指定索引的自变量槽中。

span.span: Stores the value on top of the evaluation stack in the argument slot at a specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 0B < `unsigned int16` >FE 0B < `unsigned int16` >|starg `num`starg `num`|弹出从堆栈顶部的值并将其存储在自变量槽中`num`。Pops the top value from the stack and stores it in argument slot `num`.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 弹出当前位于堆栈顶部的值并将其放置在自变量槽`num`。The value currently on top of the stack is popped and placed in argument slot `num`. `starg`指令从堆栈弹出一个值，并将其放在自变量槽中`num`。The `starg` instruction pops a value from the stack and places it in argument slot `num`. 值的类型必须匹配的参数，在当前方法的签名中指定的类型。The type of the value must match the type of the argument, as specified in the current method's signature. 对于采用变量参数列表中，过程`starg`仅用于初始固定参数，不是那些签名的可变部分中，可以使用指令。For procedures that take a variable argument list, the `starg` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature. 执行一个存储到保存的整数值小于 4 个字节长的参数截断值，如从堆栈移动到参数。Performing a store into arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long truncates the value as it moves from the stack to the argument. 从其本机大小舍入浮点值 (类型`F`) 到与参数关联的大小。Floating-point values are rounded from their native size (type `F`) to the size associated with the argument. 以下方法重载可使用`starg`操作码：The following method overload can use the `starg` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，short）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Starg_S
Public Shared ReadOnly Starg_S As OpCode

summary.span: 将位于计算堆栈顶部的值存储在自变量槽中的指定索引处（短格式）。

span.span: Stores the value on top of the evaluation stack in the argument slot at a specified index, short form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |10 < `unsigned int8` >10 < `unsigned int8` >|starg.s `num`starg.s `num`|弹出从堆栈顶部的值并将其存储在自变量槽中`num`，缩写形式。Pops the top value from the stack and stores it in argument slot `num`, short form.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 弹出当前位于堆栈顶部的值并将其放置在自变量槽`num`。The value currently on top of the stack is popped and placed in argument slot `num`. `starg.s`指令从堆栈弹出一个值，并将其放在自变量槽中`num`。The `starg.s` instruction pops a value from the stack and places it in argument slot `num`. 值的类型必须匹配的参数，在当前方法的签名中指定的类型。The type of the value must match the type of the argument, as specified in the current method's signature. `starg.s`指令提供了用于与前 256 个自变量一起使用的有效编码。The `starg.s` instruction provides an efficient encoding for use with the first 256 arguments. 对于采用变量参数列表中，过程`starg.s`仅用于初始固定参数，不是那些签名的可变部分中，可以使用指令。For procedures that take a variable argument list, the `starg.s` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature. 执行一个存储到保存的整数值小于 4 个字节长的参数截断值，如从堆栈移动到参数。Performing a store into arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long truncates the value as it moves from the stack to the argument. 从其本机大小舍入浮点值 (类型`F`) 到与参数关联的大小。Floating-point values are rounded from their native size (type `F`) to the size associated with the argument. 以下方法重载可使用`starg.s`操作码：The following method overload can use the `starg.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，byte）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, byte)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Stelem
Public Shared ReadOnly Stelem As OpCode

summary.span: 用计算堆栈中的值替换给定索引处的数组元素，其类型在指令中指定。

span.span: Replaces the array element at a given index with the value on the evaluation stack, whose type is specified in the instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |A4 < `T` >A4 < `T` >|stelem `typeTok`stelem `typeTok`|所提供的索引处的数组元素替换为值类型的`typeTok`在堆栈上。Replaces the array element at the supplied index with a value of type `typeTok` on the stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 到一个数组中的对象引用`array`，推送到堆栈上。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 索引值时， `index`，到中的元素`array`推送到堆栈上。An index value, `index`, to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 指令中指定的类型的值推送到堆栈上。A value of the type specified in the instruction is pushed onto the stack. 4. 从堆栈中弹出值、 索引和数组引用值放入给定索引处的数组元素。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem`指令替换的一维数组中提供的从零开始索引处的元素值`array`的值。The `stelem` instruction replaces the value of the element at the supplied zero-based index in the one-dimensional array `array` with the value. 值具有指定标记的类型`typeTok`指令中。The value has the type specified by the token `typeTok` in the instruction. 数组是对象，并因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects, and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引是类型`native int`。The index is type `native int`. 如果引发`array`为 null 引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果将引发`index`为负或大于的绑定`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果引发`array`不包含所需的类型的元素。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 以下方法重载可使用`stelem`操作码：The following method overload can use the `stelem` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，Type）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Stelem_I
Public Shared ReadOnly Stelem_I As OpCode

summary.span: 用计算堆栈上的 值替换给定索引处的数组元素。

span.span: Replaces the array element at a given index with the value on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9B9B|stelem.istelem.i|替换与提供的索引处的数组元素`native int`堆栈上的值。Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `native int` value on the stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 到一个数组中的对象引用`array`，推送到堆栈上。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 中的元素的有效索引`array`推送到堆栈上。A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 4. 从堆栈中弹出值、 索引和数组引用值放入给定索引处的数组元素。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem.i`指令将替换元素的值`index`中的一维数组`array`与`native int`值推送到堆栈上。The `stelem.i` instruction replaces the value of the element `index` in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `native int` value pushed onto the stack. 数组是对象，因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引是类型`native int`。The index is type `native int`. 如果引发`array`为 null 引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果将引发`index`为负或大于的绑定`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果引发`array`不包含所需的类型的元素。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 以下方法重载可使用`stelem.i`操作码：The following method overload can use the `stelem.i` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9C9C|stelem.i1stelem.i1|替换与提供的索引处的数组元素`int8`堆栈上的值。Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `int8` value on the stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 到一个数组中的对象引用`array`，推送到堆栈上。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 中的元素的有效索引`array`推送到堆栈上。A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 4. 从堆栈中弹出值、 索引和数组引用值放入给定索引处的数组元素。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem.i1`指令将替换元素的值`index`中的一维数组`array`与`int8`值推送到堆栈上。The `stelem.i1` instruction replaces the value of the element `index` in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `int8` value pushed onto the stack. 数组是对象，因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引是类型`native int`。The index is type `native int`. 如果引发`array`为 null 引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果将引发`index`为负或大于的绑定`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果引发`array`不包含所需的类型的元素。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 以下方法重载可使用`stelem.i1`操作码：The following method overload can use the `stelem.i1` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Stelem_I2

summary.span: 用计算堆栈上的 值替换给定索引处的数组元素。

span.span: Replaces the array element at a given index with the value on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9D9D|stelem.i2stelem.i2|替换与提供的索引处的数组元素`int16`堆栈上的值。Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `int16` value on the stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 到一个数组中的对象引用`array`，推送到堆栈上。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 中的元素的有效索引`array`推送到堆栈上。A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 4. 从堆栈中弹出值、 索引和数组引用值放入给定索引处的数组元素。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem.i2`指令将替换元素的值`index`中的一维数组`array`与`int16`值推送到堆栈上。The `stelem.i2` instruction replaces the value of the element `index` in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `int16` value pushed onto the stack. 数组是对象，因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引是类型`native int`。The index is type `native int`. 如果引发`array`为 null 引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果将引发`index`为负或大于的绑定`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果引发`array`不包含所需的类型的元素。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 以下方法重载可使用`stelem.i2`操作码：The following method overload can use the `stelem.i2` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 用计算堆栈上的对象 ref 值（ 类型）替换给定索引处的数组元素。

span.span: Replaces the array element at a given index with the object ref value (type ) on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |A2A2|stelem.refstelem.ref|替换与提供的索引处的数组元素`ref`值 (类型`O`) 在堆栈上。Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `ref` value (type `O`) on the stack.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 到一个数组中的对象引用`array`，推送到堆栈上。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 中的元素的有效索引`array`推送到堆栈上。A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 4. 从堆栈中弹出值、 索引和数组引用值放入给定索引处的数组元素。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem.ref`指令将替换所提供的一维数组中的索引处的元素的值`array`与`ref`(类型`O`) 值将被推送到堆栈上。The `stelem.ref` instruction replaces the value of the element at the supplied index in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `ref` (type `O`) value pushed onto the stack. 数组是对象，因此由类型的值`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引是类型`native int`。The index is type `native int`. 请注意，`stelem.ref`隐式转换到的元素类型提供的值`array`之前将值分配到的数组元素。Note that `stelem.ref` implicitly casts the supplied value to the element type of `array` before assigning the value to the array element. 此强制转换可能会失败，即使已验证的代码。This cast can fail, even for verified code. 从而`stelem.ref`指令可能会引发。Thus the `stelem.ref` instruction can throw . 对于不是从零开始的一维数组和多维数组类提供了方法。For one-dimensional arrays that aren't zero-based and for multidimensional arrays, the class provides a method. 如果引发`array`为 null 引用。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果将引发`index`为负或大于的绑定`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果引发`array`不包含所需的类型的元素。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 以下方法重载可使用`stelem.ref`操作码：The following method overload can use the `stelem.ref` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Stfld
Public Shared ReadOnly Stfld As OpCode

summary.span: 用新值替换在对象引用或指针的字段中存储的值。

span.span: Replaces the value stored in the field of an object reference or pointer with a new value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7D < `T` >7D < `T` >|stfld 从 `field`stfld `field`|替换的值`field`的具有新值的对象。Replaces the value of `field` of the object with a new value.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 对象引用或指针推送到堆栈上。An object reference or pointer is pushed onto the stack. 2. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 3. 从堆栈中弹出值和对象引用/指针值`field`对象中替换为所提供的值。The value and the object reference/pointer are popped from the stack; the value of `field` in the object is replaced with the supplied value. `stfld`指令替换的对象的字段值 (类型`O`) 或通过指针 (类型`native int`， `&`，或`*`) 使用给定值。The `stfld` instruction replaces the value of a field of an object (type `O`) or via a pointer (type `native int`, `&`, or `*`) with a given value. `Field` 是指字段成员引用的元数据标记。`Field` is a metadata token that refers to a field member reference. `stfld`指令可以具有一个或两个前缀和。The `stfld` instruction can have a prefix of either or both of and . 如果对象引用或指针为 null 引用，并且该字段是静态。 is thrown if the object reference or pointer is a null reference and the field isn't static. 如果引发`field`元数据中找不到。 is thrown if `field` is not found in the metadata. 通常时 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令转换为本机代码，而非运行时检查。This is typically checked when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instruction is converted to native code, not at runtime. 以下方法重载可使用`stfld`操作码：The following method overload can use the `stfld` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （操作码，FieldInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Stind_I
Public Shared ReadOnly Stind_I As OpCode

summary.span: 在所提供的地址存储 类型的值。

span.span: Stores a value of type at a supplied address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制转义序列和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简要参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |DFDF|用stind.i|存储`native int`在给定的地址值。Stores a `native int` value at a given address.| 堆栈转换行为按先后顺序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 一个地址推送到堆栈上。An address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 一个值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 3. 从堆栈中弹出值和地址值存储在该地址。The value and the address are popped from the stack; the value is stored at the address. `stind.i`指令存储`native int`处提供的地址值 (类型`native int`， `*`，或`&`)。The `stind.i` instruction stores a `native int` value at the supplied address (type `native int`, `*`, or `&`). 类型安全操作要求`stind.i`指令用于指针的类型与一致的方式。Type safe operation requires that the `stind.i` instruction be used in a manner consistent with the type of the pointer. 操作`stind.i`指令可更改紧跟其后或前缀指令。The operation of the `stind.i` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding or prefix instruction. 如果引发`addr`不自然对齐权限隐含的指令后缀与自变量类型。 is thrown if `addr` is not naturally aligned for the argument type implied by the instruction suffix. 以下方法重载可使用`stind.i`操作码：The following method overload can use the `stind.i` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
